reviews.review_text: Hands down the absolute best experience I’ve ever had with a plumber. Larry and his team have helped us many times over the past few years. He’s been there for repairs and to help us with plumbing updates. Most recently he did the plumbing for our home bar. He was fast, professional and knowledgeable about what needed to be done and how to do it with minimal damage to the drywall. We couldn’t be happier. I’m always telling my friends and family about him and I encourage anyone reading this review to call him for all of your plumbing needs. 10 out of 10!
Larry is great reasonably priced always on time

Larry did a great job for us. He came the same day we called. I fully expected to need a complete new water heater but he was able to find parts to put it back in operation by the next day. We will gladly call Bear the next time we need plumbing work done. Highly recommend Larry and Bear Plumbing!
Larry came through on the plumbing for our remodel. Did a very good job at a reasonable rate. Thanks Larry!

Larry Overton of Bear Plumbing responded to my request very quickly. He was able to perform the plumbing work at my home within  a short time after arrival.  The costs of the repairs were extremely reasonable. Larry and his co-worker were very respectful, courteous, and knowledgeable. Larry communicated with me prior to arrival to confirm the appointment date & time.  I have scheduled for Larry to perform additional plumbing work at my home because of the great service provided by Bear Plumbing.
Larry did a great job in a timely manner and at a reasonable price!
Larry did several jobs for me and I couldn't be more pleased! He was very professional and showed up when he said he would. The pricing was great also.
Why do water heaters fail on the weekends?  Larry answered promptly, came on time and did a great job.
Was on time courteous neat.Job well done.
Quick, responsive, kind, and knowledgeable. Will always use him for plumbing work, and refer to friends and neighbors!

Great plumbing business. Very knowledgeable, patient and kind. 100 percent guaranteed to get the job done accurately, punctually , the first time! Look no further for a great plumber, you’ve found them here!!!!
Best experience I've had with contracting plumbing work. Honest, kind and professional. I will recommend this company to everyone that I know.
Great service and very knowledgeable. Highly recommend.

I would definitely recommend Boystun Plumbing! Great communication to let me know exactly when he would arrive. Showed up super fast and fixed the problem right away. Super friendly and professional. Will definitely call again if we ever have plumbing issues.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! These guys have been working behind my apartment the last 3 days till morning up until 9 at night these guys most definitely are hard workers! And kind too!
Great service.  Brandon did a fantastic job.
Barnett has literally bailed me out of two water leak problems and frozen pipes in the past 6 months and I want to survive without him thanks a lot boys

You know, I didn’t even get to use Barnett for what I needed, but I was compelled to do a review because of their professionalism and friendliness. I called before they probably should have been open and was kindly helped by their dispatcher and main office lady queen :-) I was working to get help from a couple of different plumbers based on neighbor’s recommendation, and Barnett was one he recommended.  The other company had already started the steps in our process, and in the meantime Barnett called me back and was ready to send someone out the Same day. Barnett had worked me in, and she gave me an estimate on labor and cost that seemed fair.    If I have needs in the future, I will contact Barnett plumbing. It’s things like this that make me proud to do local business in and around the Florence and Killen area.

I will use Barnett plumbing for any plumbing needs.   I had  a somewhat problematic toilet.   They went above and beyond finding the issue and putting in extra work to ensure that my problem was resolved.  Very professional and kind.   GOOD FOLKS.
I don't know who this matt guy is but he must do good work if I need any one please send him out thanks

It started with calling Lisa Monday afternoon/evening and explaining the situation.  Lisa was kind, knowledgeable and fantastic to speak with.  Then one of her techs came out Matthew on Tuesday afternoon.  He was right on time, actually listened while I told him what was going on and went right to work.  He was able to pinpoint the issue within about 15 minutes and had it fixed roughly 45 minutes later.  I can't thank Barnett Plumbing enough for the relief of having everything work wonderfully after about 8 years.  Thanks Lisa and Matt you two are the exact reason we will also look to Barnett in the future!!!!!
Lisa at Barnett Plumbing was a life saver and my hero today! Hot water heater went bad last night and I called this morning and Lisa did a great job taking care of me! Thank you Barnett Plumbing!
They are the best plumbers! Always helpful and competent!
Fast and affordable
The technicians were able to locate me and my problem at a great time with a good amount of payment.

I called them on a Friday at 3pm they came out after hours to snake my lines. Realized it was a bigger issue. They set me up first thing Monday. They found my issue quickly and got all the permits they needed to dig. They showed me everything and explained everything to me. They guys are very friendly, and trustworthy. Working with them was a breeze! They’re the only ones I’ll call for plumbing issues.

Had a galvanized water line that was busted under a house. I needed it fixed that same day, as we had an inspection the following day. They got it done same day and for a reasonable price. Both plumbers that showed up were very polite and professional and the office staff was great to work with! Definitely recommend using Barnett!
Dependable and affordable.
They really met my needs...ASAP..THANKS GUYS.
These guys are awesome! They will show up quick and give you a good price. Very grateful

Matthew is our hero!  He repaired the water pump on our well and saved our vacation.  He was professional, pleasant and prompt.  He had to go get a part, returned, and worked well past quitting time to take care of us.  Thank  you Matthew and Barnett Plumbing!
Great service!
Great job. Thx.
Great place

Well they came out and did a great job at fixing my problem and they were professional and used top quality materials for the repair I'm impressed! I'm difficult to impress,if I could complain about something I would ! At first I thought they were a little high by about 40 dollar's, I didn't say anything, after they left is when I really looked  and seen he used stainless steel braided line simply the best money could buy materials! A+
By far the best I have used.  Prompt, courteous, respectful of my home and fair price.

Carlos and Stephen fixed two leaky faucets and repaired/replaced a diverter and drain stopper in a shower.  I felt very comfortable having them in my home.  I found them to be knowledgeable, and patient about explaining everything to me!  They also were patient with our barking nipping dog and nosey cat!  Thank you guys!
They were amazing and would recommend!  They were professional and found a leak that 3 other plumbers could not locate. Will definitely use again and highly recommend!
Excellant service! Reasonable prices  installing a hot water heater and very professional. Everything cleaned up after the job was done. I do reccomend 100%.
Good Group of Plumbers and office personnel
Great service.
Trustworthy and dependable.  Good communication.  They plumb it right.

Very satisfied with Barnett Plumbing. Eden was very efficient, friendly and fast to respond to my initial call to the office (on a Saturday afternoon it took less than 5 minutes for callback and he was there fixing the problem within 30 minutes). A great employee and I will be asking specifically for him if the need for more plumbing work should arise. I give Barnett 6/5 stars...easily!

We had our plumbing replaced a couple of weeks ago and couldn’t have asked for better service. They came to look at our plumbing, and within two days, they were here to replace it all. They were professional and the price was great! They also did a fantastic job! We’ll definitely be calling them for our future plumbing needs.

THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU - What a great company!  You guys saved me today (Sunday night....) Toilet and two sinks repaired/replaced.  It't not every day that a company goes above and beyond but BARNETT DOES!
Very satisfied customer!!! I had a mystery leak. Mike and Brad came out and took care of business. They were very fast and very professional.
Great plumbers
Our faucet broke and I called Barnett Plumbing that morning at they were there by that afternoon.  They did a great job replacing our faucet and were extremely efficient and professional.
Wonderful! They came quickly and fixed the problem
Dondvan and Rusty did a Great job for Mr White fixed his leak and got his water back on Thanks guys

Called Alex out to my duplex for two rentals with two malfunctioning water heaters. He fixed them quickly and for a reasonable price. I will be using him for all the repairs on all of my rental properties!

Called Alex Fussell at 9 on a Friday night because there was water coming from the ceiling in my kitchen. He showed up quickly and acted with complete professionalism. He fixed the problem with minimal sheetrock damage. A very neat and timely repair! I am going to recommend him to everyone I know!
My plumbing problem was not an easy one to solve. But, Alex knew what to do and spent a good deal of time making sure everything was right. I don't plan to use any other plumber from now on.

reviews.reviewer_name: Julie Brown, Realtor at Southern Elite Realty, LLC
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Alex Fussell.  He did an outstanding job re-plumbing my house.   If I could give him 10 Stars I would.   If you are in need of any plumbing give him a call!
Fast response and good work!
Great work!  Excellent customer service!
Jason and his crew replaced our water heater a few weeks ago. The unit is performing perfectly since it was installed. They came the same day I called and did the work for a very reasonable price.

I was looking for a good honest plumber and Jason had some really good reviews so we gave him a try and he lived up to those reviews.  He worked us in quickly, communicated when he was running a little behind.  Jason and his crew were very friendly and professional, got the job done and the price was reasonable!

Jason's Drain Service did some work on our older home that included replacing a drain pipe under the house and installing a new pressure control valve. Jason Hunter and his team were friendly, professional and did a great job. If you are looking for a true professional with over 30 years experience who will show up when he promises and get your job done efficiently, give Jason a call. I will definitely call him again when needed.

I called Jason Drain service due to a slowly draining kitchen sink. Sadly, it is a major problem that we won't get fixed until we absolutely have no choice but to do so, in the future. This is at a house that we just bought in another neighborhood. Anyway, Jason and his partner were just the best!!!   Unrelated to drains, my husband was trying to pick at a mound of concrete that the former owners poured onto the driveway. They got out their jack hammer like tool and helped him out before they left.

I recently used Jason’s Drain Service for 2 jobs.   Don’t let the name fool you, they do much more than drains. They replaced a hot water heater (job 1) and replaced the cartridges in both of my bathtub faucets (job 2).  Both faucets are working perfectly now and we have plenty of hot water. Their pricing is reasonable.

However, the best thing about them is their willingness to work with your schedule and punctuality. For both jobs, I asked them to come on a specific date. They can on the date requested and were here shortly after 8:00.  This is a drastic change from my previous plumber who was totally unreliable.

Jason also did not mind me standing over his shoulder and asking questions. He even stayed a couple of extra minutes to make sure that one faucet stopped dripping.

His prices are reasonable.  He is *extremely* fair with his pricing.

He is also very helpful with general information without charging for just a 5 minute conversation.

EDIT: I just used him for a third job.  He again was very punctual which was amazing given we are in the middle of a very hard freeze.  His price for today's job was more than fair.

I highly recommend Jason’s Drain Service.
Did great and quick work on a leak I had outside going under the sidewalk. Thanks!
Honest, quick, and great pricing!
Excellent and trustworthy service. Highly recommend.

This is the plumber I've been looking for all these years. For real, Jason's drain was the 6th plumber I tried. Some of the others were bad, some were alright, but Jason was the only one that was great. It is such a relief to finally find a plumber I can trust and rely on. Thank you Jason!
He had great communication skills and got to my job in a very prompt manner. Perfect work and very reasonable price. Would not hesitate to use him again. 7 out of 5 stars.
These guys are great. Very professional, reasonable price, on time, quick and clean. If needed will definitely use again!

I was very happy that I called  Jason drain service. A very  professional  service. I am well pleased with the service that was given. Jason is a very nice kind person and I recommend this business. Thanks Jason.
Very professional plumbing company.  Very honest and came on time, did a great job, cleaned up afterwards.  I recommend highly.
Honest and straightforward. Excellent service and stands by his work.

Awesome people!! Hands down will call them for all my plumbing needs! Jason is trust worthy and gets the job done.  The young fellow with him is very respectful and helpful! This is who yall need to go with!! Good job!!
The guys came out short notice, stayed until they got it right, & the price was very reasonable. Highly recommend!
Very straightforward and trustworthy... You can leave them in the house and go. Would recommend to faily and friends. A+
Great local guy that is honest and reliable.  Will definitely call again for my water issue needs!
Quality work, great pricing, and friendly service!

We have used Jason's Drain Service multiple times over the past few years. He has done plumbing jobs for my husband and I when we needed EMERGENCY work done, AND one job that ended up being more extensive than planned - but was the BEST job yet. He has done work on the interior and exterior of our older house, AND has upgraded fixtures for us. We couldn't be happier. He is honest, efficient, hard working, and the price point was a relief for us. In a day when it's hard to find service workers who possess both skill and integrity, I HIGHLY recommend Jason, who has both!

salser-plumbing-and-septic-service-llc.business name: Salser Plumbing and Septic Service, LLC

reviews.review_text: Great company, very responsive came out to fix the issue same day. Quality work at a good price would definitely recommend.

Brandon responded to my text quickly on Sunday stating he could be at my house by 9:30 Monday morning. He actually showed up early texting me when he was on his way. My sump pump was not working, he identified the problem quickly. My float had gone bad, he replaced the float with one he had at his shop so there was no ordering parts. Works perfectly now, he even took the time to fix one of my toliets. He was very professional and just a really nice guy. The price was better than I expected especially with the time and effort it took. Will definitely be using his services in the future.
Highly recommend! Quality work done efficiently with a great sense of humor!

My father needed help with his line backing up. Salser plumbing was on time and returned
My calls. He pumped the tank and repaired issues at both ends. Very good price and service. I recommend Salser plumbing if your in need of such services.
Very good at what they do, will recommend them to everyone.
Courteous and knowledgeable people. They did a great job installing filtration system on my house!!!

We needed a water heater installed so, I called Ard Plumbing and Electric, the young lady who answered scheduled us for next day. Robert Ard was punctual had this water heater hooked up in timely manner. The price charged was very reasonable. That night I noticed water on the floor and in the catch pan. I called them the next morning and Robert came back and fixed the leaks which required replacing factory parts of the water heater. Robert stood good on his work and we were only charged for the parts for the 2.5 hours he was here.
Robert if you're reading this, I give you an atta boy!
Great bunch of guys. Very happy with the work done and at a fair price. I would recommend them for any projects you may need done.

This review is overdue, but Robert and Chris came out to add electricity to my she-shed in fall of 2018. They were very professional and did an outstanding job. The job involved installing a ground wire from my house to the shed, adding multiple outlets, and installing a light fixture. They also provided an additional outlet where we park on the way. The cost was about half what some of the others estimated.

I called a week ago, spoke with message person and they haven't called me back.

Update.
I called back, Robert said he didn't get the message and he installed my new water filter system the same day.
Great prices. Fast service
Nice
Called for a quote, they where kind and professional.
Expect the best. Great service.

We are very pleased with the service that ARD Plumbing & Electric has provided. We have used Chris for 2 plumbing jobs now (1 major & one minor) and have been quite satisfied. I highly recommend ARD Plumbing & Electric as they are prompt, courteous, affordable, and provide high quality work.
We were affected  by Hurricane Michael. He came out the day we called and was a tremendous help.
Awesome go to company. Nathan Flippo is a life saver.

I would definitely recommend Eric for any job! My lawnmower was leaking oil and wouldn’t start. Eric came to my home around 4:30pm and had my lawnmower fixed and back to me by 7pm. He showed me pictures of where he took everything apart and cleaned it up really nice!  He even sharpened my blade for me!! Looks like a brand new lawnmower!! I will definitely give Eric a call whenever I have any other problem that needs fixing.
Was so kind and very helpful! He'll definitely be my official plumber guy from here on out.
Great work and great prices! 10/10 recommend
They go above and beyond. Their work is impeccable I definitely recommend this company. They will be my first call from here on out.
Worked efficiently on our outdoor lights and doorbell to ensure they worked properly. Friendly, professional, & very resourceful and quick. Would rehire!
Does great work
Poe's service provides excellent service and is very reasonable.  Eric really cares about his work and customers.  I highly recommend him.  The best around here.
GREAT LITTLE COMPANY HERE. GLAD I FOUND THEM FOR SURE!!
I think he is the best!
Does great works
Highly recommended

Highly recommend Poe's! Eric and his son came around 7 pm, checked out the problem with our water meter, made a phone call, got the materials he needed and fixed the problem for us. Really glad he came out because we were without water since Friday and we were told that we'd have to wait until about noon tomorrow for America's Rental Managers to get someone out here. Customer service was great. He told me he'd have it fixed for us tonight and he did. After he fixed the water meter he explained what caused it and how he went about fixing it.
What a great service,everything perfect

Great people. Had a water heater installed by them and they did a great job. When the gas valve failed in less than a year (manufacturer defect, not their fault) they worked hard to make sure I didn't have to pay a penny, even though the manufacturer was out of stock on replacement parts due to the shipping and labor crisis. They worked with the supplier to make a warranty claim to replace the entire heater instead. Highly recommended, honest people. Will be calling back in the future.

We have used Morrison plumbing on multiple occasions for work on our homes in Chelsea and Greystone.  The team is very professional, on time, friendly and calls back after the work is complete to make sure we are satisfied.  I highly recommend this team.
Great job as always. He's always ontime and knows his stuff.

Made the appointment, arrived as promised. Very professional and efficient in his work and great quality repair and install! No mess to clean up and very reasonably priced Highly recommend this company for your plumbing needs.

Hydrotech Plumbing recently did a few projects in our home and we couldn't be more pleased! Michael is first class in his professionalism and in his work. We've found our plumber for any future plumbing needs we may have due to the great work he does.
We greatly appreciated his work and we highly recommend Hydrotech Plumbing for any plumbing projects you may have!

Thanks again!

Keys Family
Guntersville Alabama

Very Professional, called when he was on his way. Competent, explained the problem, and didn’t waste any time getting it resolved.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Michael is awesome
Michael is great.  Professional.  Knowledge.  Communicates well.  We have used Michael in the past and now again with HydroTech.  Give Michael a call.  You will not be disappointed.
The company and it's workers are very professional and knowledgeable on all things underground...
Great
It’s the best
My company is working with them for some quotes and work in Alabama. Extremely honest, straightforward and truly take a "Partner" approach to jobs with other companies.
They get the jobs done!
The best group of guys you could ever ask for! They all know the underground world that is for sure!!
Always gone out of the way to help and done what he was supposed to do

Needed some facuet's replaced Colin came out did a remarkable job So professional an fast they look Amazing Such A Great Company to do business with An very reasonable wouldn't have wanted better service!

Wow....David and Colin came in and took care of all our faucet and toliet repairs in a flash. Such nice people and really good with our 4 legged guys running around. They were on-time and actually running early and gave me a 30 minutes heads up to see if I was OK with it, which I was glad to hear. I have no problem recommending them or calling them again for plumbing or gas line issues. This is a fantastic small business and very worth your consideration.

I cannot speak highly enough of Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance. I called their office one afternoon and within a few hours, they arrived at our house to fix our water leak. They kept us informed throughout the process and explained where the leak was. Do not hesitate to contact Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance!

We have used David Strickland several times for different projects, the latest being the replacement of our hot water heater.  He comes when he says he will be there, he is quick to respond when you call, and he does a great job.  We won't use anyone else.

This is a fantastic company.  It's owned by an individual, which I like.  But what I like more is that they were on time, did an excellent job on installing a new toilet and a kitchen sink faucet, and it didn't cost the earth.  This is the only company I'll use when I need a plumber.

David Strickland installed a gas tankless hot water heater for us this week and, as always, did a fantastic job. David is the only plumber we use & he has helped us for many years. We highly recommend him.
We have had Strickland do two home projects for us now. They got it done quickly and professionally. Honest, friendly, locally owned company, and highly recommend.
David Strickland installed a new sink in our kitchen. He was quick, professional, and very reasonably priced.  Highly recommend him!
I highly recommend Strickland for all plumbing repairs.  Professional and all around great person!
Great service! I've used them twice now for separate issues. Each time they made it out earlier than the appointments and had me fixed within an hour.
If you want a job done right, and to be treated like a customer wants to be treated, then call Strickland Plumbing.  By far the most experienced and professional plumber around. Highly recommended !!

r-d-heating-and-air-hvac-maintenance-con.business name: R & D Heating and Air - HVAC Maintenance Contractor, Heating and Air Conditioning Service Pell City AL

reviews.review_text: Have had to use Ron twice now when my AC went out. Last time it was on a holiday weekend, and both times he showed up same day to repair my unit. Funny, professional, personable, and very fairly priced, especially on the holiday visit. I'll use Ron every time fong forward for my AC and HVAC issues! Thanks Ron!

Ronald did 100% the absolute best job and service we ever had. He was on time, did the job quickly. He was completely polite. With no fowl language. Explained what he was working on, and how it goes the entire way. Also was the best price anywhere. No one could go wrong hiring R&D heating and air. After 2 months our power bill has dropped dramatically. Way to go Ronald and thank you very much.
R@D was awesome !! He came out on a Sunday and fixed my air. Very reasonable price  .very pleased
These guys are fantastic.   Great service.  Highly recommend.
Had a problem with my ac and the owner was nice enough to come after hours and check out what was wrong with it. He was able to get it fixed for a good price.

I cannot say enough good things about R & D Heating and Air. If I could I would give this review 10 stars. It’s never easy coming out of pocket for major unexpected purchases but when they happens you want someone you can trust. I’ll tell you now why I trust R & D services
I needed my 30 year old Hvac unit (R22) and furnaces replaced a few weeks ago and it just  happened to be in the middle of one of the hottest summers in recent memory, and decided to get several quotes from companies in the area. Ron the owner of R &D was extremely knowledgeable and was able to assess my situation and give clear guidance on what we needed. Ron was also able to identify potential roadbumps prior to the install and plan for them which none of the other companies mentioned with my unit being in a very small attic space. Ron and his team worked quickly to get my families air back going and the new unit installed and was able to reconfigure the new unit and add addition safety features to Eliminate the possibility of a leaking into my ceiling which was problem in the past. The workmanship was top notch and I never felt pressured or rushed to pull the trigger. If you are needing HVAC service from a fair, honest, and experienced technician please have a conversation with Ron. I can personally guarantee after that conversation you will be more informed and presented with options around your needs as well as feel confident of your decision afterwards.
Mr Ron came to my house on a Saturday night after hours to check my ac unit, so we were very grateful for him to do that. He’s also so nice and friendly, 10/10 recommend.👍

Ron did a fabulous job at installing our new system! We had to go through the insurance process since it was storm related and he was professional and kept up with everything for us that needed to be turned into them for our claim. He showed up when he said he would, he was honest in his diagnosis, and he was more than reasonable in his charges. Sometimes when you have folks out there working on your residence they'll leave trash - not Ron. Minus cold air blowing from my vents, I didn't know he was there! I would recommend Ron over and over again. So long as he is in business, he will be the one I call for all my heating/air needs.

R&D installed my A/C, heat pump, heat strips and air handler. My compressor had gone out on our 30yr old Carrier unit. We decided it was a better option to replace the entire unit than to replace the compressor. Ron is super friendly and professional. He explained everything to us in detail and answered any questions we had. He and his crew had our system in and operating in one day. I had quotes from a few different businesses, and R&D beat their prices by thousands. One company had quoted me starting at $7,000 more for an inferior unit. R&D provided us with 10 yr warranties on parts and the compressor and 2yrs on services. I feel like R&D provided us with the most value for our money and we now have a top shelf HVAC system professionally installed by a company that knows their trade inside and out. I would recommend R&D heating and air to anyone that needs any kind of HVAC work done.

Outstanding services provided by R & D. They came out to service and clean my outdoor unit upon cleaning the unit Ron informed me that my capacitor was bad. They replaced it the same day with ease. Kind, informative, and they treat you like family. They will be my go to.

This team is very honest, affordable and efficient. Mr.Dollar was able to fix and replace the part same day and was so kind while doing so. I was very pleased with the service and I plan to use them for all of my heating and air conditioning needs

Their HVAC maintenance team arrived on time, fully equipped, and ready to handle any issue I had with my heating and air system. They quickly diagnosed the problem and provided me with several options to fix it. Great job indeed!!!
Heating and Air conditioner fixing service is absolutely brilliant. Use again.

Outstanding AC work done by Ron and his assistant.  After 37 years, our AC unit finally gave up. On the suggestion of a friend, we called Ron to assess the situation. He came that same night and made a plan to get our unit back up and running.  We are very pleased with his response time and professionalism. Our unit installation wasn't an easy task, but Ron did a quality job. Give this guy a call for your heating and cooling needs. He works hard to make sure things are done right and is a pleasure to work with.  A+++ service!!
I was very pleased I will use this company for now on! They took there time and explained everything
Great company to work with, quality workmanship, would recommend if you need any type of construction work.
Jared was very thorough with explanation of what he was doing and how he was doing it. Very professional and also friendly, easy to talk too. Highly recommended.

On time, knowledgeable,, experienced, and thorough.
Just a few words to describe what you’ll experience with the Jared and wife team at Leak Pros.
And did I say trustworthy? That nails it, too.
We wouldn’t hesitate to call them again. We are lucky to have found them.

I always cringe when I have to call someone I’m not familiar with, but we were very happy our service. He fixed the problem quickly, and we thought the price was reasonable. I’m hoping I don’t need a plumber again anytime soon, but if I do, I would definitely call Harris County Plumbing again.

Parker Tent is respectful and honest.He explained everything he did step by step.He was also on time and very professional.He took his time and did not rush even though it was a Sunday afternoon.He made sure the job was done to my satisfaction..
100% JOB PERFECTION... Identified, Assessed and Solved. HCP will be the only one I call for plumbing for now on. NUFF SAID...
Parker did a great job fixing my kitchen sink. I'd definitely refer him to friends and family. His prices were fair as well.
The technician was punctual and professional. Answered all questions. We will use for all plumbing needs in the future.

Honest and professional plumber! It feels good when you finally find someone who is good at something and you can rely on them.  For plumbing its Harris County Plumbing for me from now on. Highly recommended. Thanks man.

Outstanding service!  My water main sprung a leak my side of the meter.  I was desperate to get the problem repaired and water restored to my house.  The gentlemen that runs this business was the only person I could get a hold of in the area that could fix the problem the same day.  While he had to come out later in the evening due to previously scheduled jobs, he had my water main fixed and water restored to my house by  9:00 P.M.  Incredibly helpful and friendly.  I would definitely recommend his work to anyone looking for a great plumber!
Did good work and the work was reasonably priced. He was very punctual and was also willing to give me some advice on other issues I was going to fix. I recommend him to anyone with plumbing issues.

Harris County Plumbing is punctual, professional and does top notch work.

We had a plumbing emergency on Memorial weekend,  and thought we wouldn't be able to find someone to come out.  HCP was at our house within 30 minutes of calling, applied a temporary fix and them resolved the issue first thing Memorial day.
Professional and hassle free! I called and they came out the day after and had everything back to normal in just a couple of hours!
9/1/23 Mr McGuire came out (Goat Rock area)  due to alarm sounding on my septic. Very quick response time. Super friendly service. Reasonably priced. Highly recommend and will use them in the future.

Mr. Ed came out to service my septic tank in Feb 2023.... I had an issue with my septic tank this past weekend,I called Mr. Ed today 05-30-2023 he can came out TODAY and rectified the issue,and told me if I had any other issues not to hesitate to call him.... Not only is  Mr. Ed and his crew professional,Mr.Ed is very personable and friendly....  I  highly recommend M&M for your septic tank needs....

Mr Ed I'm assuming the owner, came out this morning 02/03/2023 to Fort Mitchell to service my septic tank, he was very nice,professional and thorough, did a great job.... He wasn't satisfied, until I was satisfied.... Thanks,Mr. Ed GREAT JOB,l definitely will be recommending to my friends and family...
They were very quick and done a great job.
They are fast, personable and professional. They also, recommended and installed Tank Risers for easy maintenance in the future.

He hooked everything up to monitor the system and noted that the fan wasn't moving as fast as it should have been.  He found that the fan motor was burnt out and this is what caused the capacitors to blow.  He quickly replaced the fan motor and ensured that everything was working properly before he left.
I absolutely adore Lovelace services, they have got to be the best place to get your AC fixed. The technician that worked on my unit his name was Lynn he was incredibly helpful and very professional.

Jeremy Cowan is our super-hero!!🙌 He was communicative, timely, professional and friendly. After an extremely negative experience with a different repair technician, we were leery to have anyone else try to help.

He also stated he was going to order a part to repair the damage our dishwasher was causing when it leaked. This technician never returned and we never heard from him again. Jeremy was easily able to not only repair our dishwasher, he simply pulled it out from under the counter, connected the hose that was disconnected and causing the leak, and stayed to test the dishwasher more than once to be sure there were no remaining leaks or anything he may have missed.

reviews.review_text: Called Monday schedule for Wednesday arrived on time. Mr. Michael was super professional and informative. The price was the best in town. Definitely will use them again and refer my friends and family.
Great service and friendly folks! I would definitely recommend Royal Flush!

On time friendly and very professional
Love them! They went above and beyond to get the job done! 100% satisfaction!

2nd time customer. They are on time type of people which is always appreciated. Serviced our system pretty quick and packed everything back down. The most reasonable prices out there with quality work.  10/10 Good folks

Great Service!! We had an 8:00 appt. We received a call stating they were on their way. They arrived on time and were very professional. The job was completed in a professional and timely manner. If/when we have our tank serviced again we will definitely be calling them.

First off, my wife and I had the total nightmare of our septic system suddenly failing and we were not able to take a shower, flush the toilet, do laundry, or dishes.  Furthermore, we had no idea where our septic tank was.

They were able to find the septic tank, which is somehow partially under our AC unit and our deck (Look, we didn't build this house, okay?) which felt like waking up from a nightmare only to wake up and find out it's much worse than that.

But these guys were able to so skillfully, and delicately move around their obstacles with no damage to anything, and get our septic tank fixed. I am beyond impressed and so very thankful!

This company you can rely on. Called and they kindly added us to the daily schedule. Mike doesn't any $#!+ behind, (pun intended). This is the only company that we have called on over the 17 years we have been here! Grade A $#!+ crew.
Very professional and honest company. I would recommend them !

They came and did a job on my septic tank, I was very happy with their work, today when I needed service by a plumber, their referral did the job the same day and I would use him again.

This company does things right! I am a customer & am not related to any owners or employees of this business! I did this review because of the excellent work they have done for me all these years!

I cannot thank this business enough! Called on a Sunday evening with an emergency and he was at my house within a couple hours! Thank you so much for everything. I will let everyone know about your services!

We have used LKE Plumbing on two different jobs. Zach and Chris are very quick in their response to your call and they give you a time of when to expect them to arrive at your home.  They are very professional and explain everything to you in “plain” terms.

*They do not do any work without your approval             first.
*There are no surprise cost at the end of the job. *They are very reasonably priced.
* They are very knowledgeable plumbers!
* They keep everything neat and they clean up after the job is complete.

I would highly recommend LKE Plumbing and will use them again ~ 5 Stars!

I have used LKE Plumbing 3 times now. Each time was for something different. If I called and had to leave a message, Zach messaged back within 10 minutes saying he got my message and would call me after he left his current Customer appointment  was over. He kept that promise everytime! Zach called to reconfirm my appointment, called when he was on his way to my house,  was right on time,  and didn’t try to sell me things I did not need. He explained everything to me in ‘non plumbing’ terms and told me all of my options. It’s hard to find that! He was very honest when he quoted me estimates. When  he left my house, you could not even tell a plumber was here. It was spotless! I didn’t have to clean my bathrooms up and my carpet and hardwoods after him. I will ABSOLUTELY use him again!
These guys are very knowledgeable and professional .  Their prices are very reasonable. They leave the area they work in clean. I recommend them for all your plumbing needs.

Closed Thursday.

I can highly recommend Spencer for the job he did for me.  So glad I called him.

The repairs were made...folks this is service! this man has a wife and child at home. Thank you Spencer and we wish you and your family a very Merry Christmas! Thank You!

reviews.review_text:
I posted a request for a local plumber for an RV Leak . Most residential businesses shy away from this because of the aggregation and difference between RV and residential .
5 minutes after my post I got a call from Evans Plumbing . I was told that they could help me out “ sometime “ after lunch
I realized that they were busy and already doing other scheduled projects . I was told they would be able to help me sometime after lunch . Well . Got a call at 5:30 pm  , Nick , with Evans Plumbing is at my driveway gate .  ?  What , ??  I used to own my own construction business , by 5:30pm I wanted to be at home with my family ( and beer ) .
He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !
He took care of the problem and did an excellent job !!
I highly recommend EVANS PLUMBING !!!
Super professionals . Solved a problem that another plumber wouldn’t tackle .  Completed two major jobs for me . Fairly priced for the work involved .

Super, super nice guys. When I called, the gentleman who answered the phone answered all of my (crazy) questions with uncomplicated answers, and was very helpful! Prompt response time and had the job done in less than an hour!

The service was good by Aaron and Hunter May 16th 2024 Kitchen leak was repaired and so far it is very stable I appreciate their Kindness and Intelligence doing such a great job
Thanks very much
For your service
Donna Burnham 🙂

Aaron, that came out to the house, was not only very helpful and informative, but saved me lots of money compared to previous quotes!
I recommend this company above all other plumbing companies in Mobile County!!!
Great service!! Professional, timely, reasonable and did a great job!! Will definitely be using this company again! Thanks so much for all the help!

Great company and very professional!
Customer Service is wonderful. Always there when we need them.

Good work, dam well know your job. And took pride in it. Better than the manufacturer did, and that's a fact. Thank you for your time that you spent with the insurance company. NIGHTMARE I know so again thank you.

If I could give 10 Stars I would ! Walked us through the whole process and explained everything to us on a level we understood !

I've utilized this company several times for various reasons over the past year, and they have exceeded my expectations each time. I couldn't be more satisfied. Thank you, Richard's Restoration. I will definitely use your services for future needs.

Richard and his crew were very professional, friendly and quick. They did two bathrooms for me and if I need more work done to Amy other rooms I'm calling Richard Restoration for sure!

Richard Restoration did an amazing job restoring and remodeling my kitchen and bathroom after water damage due to a leaking pipe. Richie was wonderful to work with and handled all of the insurance claim information, which made the process a lot less stressful for me. His crew was professional, respectful, knowledgeable, and fast. Richie came the same day the leak and damage was found and kept me informed throughout the whole process. He went above and beyond to make sure that my home was properly restored. I love my new kitchen and bathroom! I highly recommend Richards Restoration.
Fantastic job working with my insurance to fix our bathroom after a leak!

This is the best team for all your restoration needs!  Our entire home flooded from a busted pipe upstairs.  Richard and his team responded quickly and they helped us through the entire process.  Great quality work, fast, dependable and honest!  We couldn’t be happier with our home!

Richard's restoration came in at a timely rate, assessed the situation and mitigated my issue within hours of me calling . They took every precaution necessary to keep me and my family safe and taken care of throughout the whole process . Very proffesional business to do work with. They handle everything for you even down to the phone calls. I highly recommend.

Richard Restoration helped our church (Safe Harbor Church of God in Rainbow City) in a very timely manner when a pipe froze and burst on Christmas of 2022. Their company was prompt and professional. They had several people working and therefore were able to finish the work much faster than we anticipated. Besides remediation, they painted walls, repaired sheet rock, and installed flooring. Everything was done with excellence. They even helped us when dealing with the insurance adjuster. We highly recommend Richard Restoration.

Richard Restoration responded quickly to my house when i had a leak and it flooded.  They took care of the problem and remodeled my house. I couldn’t be happier with the outcome.  I appreciate them!   They did such a good job.  Thanks, Richard Restoration! I’m one happy customer and highly recommend them for any of your restoration needs

Chris has been our handyman for a few years now and has always been prompt and excels at any project we ask of him. On top of that, he’s just a really great guy—easy to work with and easy to get along with. I will literally never use any other handyman. He’s the best!

Chris has been doing odd jobs for me for 8 years, I can't tell you how much he's saved me in repairs! I'd recommend his services to anyone who wants fair prices with quick response time and quality work.

Barry and his crew showed up early , knocked out a 200 foot fence for us in half a day . I’m a very picky person , woth that being said . I couldn’t find a flaw . These guys are as top notch as they come !

Johnny has been taking care of our plumbing needs for years. He's fast, dependable and has reasonable rates.

rescue-me-home-inspections-northern-alab.business name: Rescue Me Home Inspections (Northern Alabama location)

reviews.review_text: Edward was very detailed with his report and his communication with us was awesome!
Report was very detailed and the communication and explanation was thorough.
Great response to my call and did a great job on the inspection!

Mr Herbster was extremely knowledgeable and provided additional information in effort to ensure we understood each finding. The water was not on at the time of inspection and Mr. Herbster made a second trip to our property to inspect the plumbing at no extra charge. He was professional, timely and very informative during each step of the process.

This was the best decision I could have made. The reports were very detailed and informative. He inspected this home as if he were buying it. I couldn’t ask for better customer service. He called and explained everything to me in detail. He is retired military and firefighter. Thank you for your service to this country. I would recommend to everyone.

Edward was very informative, professional, and knowledgeable. The report was easy to read, had all the information from the roof to the basement floor. Edward walked me through the process of what was most important to what was least to be fixed. Thank you .
Quick and detailed inspection. Very professional. Highly recommend

This was hands down, the best home inspection experience we have ever had. The inspection report was easy to understand. The report had the technical terms and an explanation in layman's terms . There were lots of photos showing what Ed (the inspector) found. Ed even put in the report WHY a finding was important. For example, double tapping a breaker (putting two wires in a single breaker) can cause a short or even a fire. The picture showed what the double tap looked like. If you want to be able to understand your inspection report, Rescue Me Home Inspections is the place to go. Ask for Ed. You'll be happy you did!
Attention to detail and professionalism are a rare thing nowadays. Ed's inspection was spot on and received great results from the buyers of our home. Great job.

Ed has all ways done a great job for me and my family throughout the years. He is the first one I call when I need an inspection and when my friends ask about one. Very professional and works hard to provide quality work. Thanks Ed.
The inspector arrived on time. He gave me an overview that evening and I received a final report the next day. Very professional and highly recommend.

Mr Ed Herbster was prompt, informative, and very experienced! I would most certainly recommend Rescue Me Home Inspections (North Alabama) and I will use again for any further Tests or Inspections!

Thank You

I ordered a home inspection on a home. Ed found many small things that needed to be repaired or changed that I was able to forward to my realtor so the seller could make the changes. He included photos with the description so it was easy to see what we had written.

Pat and his guys got the job done quick and on time. They saved me money and were very helpful! I will definitely be using them again!!!

When the day came, they were on time, and when they came across unexpected snafus they dealt with it at the same price they had quoted me originally. Also (mostly) cleaned up after themselves, didn't leave a huge mess for me to deal with. I've been recommending them to everyone I know, and will be calling them back for more work that needs to be done.

The service and professionalism provided by Brandon and Brian were phenomenal.   No project is too big or too small for this company.  I will certainly call them again when I'm in need of home repairs or furniture assembly.  Thanks again!

Mr. Hart was very responsive, he called back right away and arrived shortly there after. Mr. Hart thoroughly inspected my HVAC system and got my heating running immediately. Nick and Nelson blew us away with their promptness, professionalism, knowledge and quality of work!  Will never use another service.  More than pleased!!!!  We highly recommend them.

10/10 recommend, super friendly, arrived on time. got the job done in a timely manner and haven’t had any complications since before they fixed my problems. Completely earned my trust and service, will be using them from here on out.

My air had suddenly stopped working and he was able to diagnose the problem and get on it right away! It took him no time to get it back up and running. He was so helpful. He even noticed my loose sink as he washed his hands and offered to fix it on the house! I will definitely be using them for all my maintenance needs.

freakin' awesome store, with a little bit of everything for fishing, for the water, for the boat. Really nice and helpful people. Bought a great straw hat, since I left my hat at the house, and a few miscellaneous items.

Chelsea was extremely helpful and just makes you smile when you meet her. They got all the products I needed and gave what I call “expert advice”! Thanks to all of you. I’ve been going to Marshall Marine For years now,as well as All my family.Weve had boats our whole life & it really means a lot when u can go to one place to get everything u need for ur boat & so much more.Staff has always been like family & prompt to help u with anything.I also go each summer to get my coastas n love their T-shirt’s .if ur looking for a place that values customers & enjoys helping ppl,plz check Marshals out,U won’t ever be disappointed n ull leave with a satisfied feeling.Were lucky to have these guys in The bayou.

Loved this store because of the great selections of marine supplies, decent prices, and the fact that they care about the customer. Wanted to buy one of their ls t-shirts but could never catch an XL size. They promised to send one to me in Idaho and they did! I could not believe it..
Love it buy all my shorts and glasses. Very good staff

Fast, friendly, quality service with no surprises! I was very happy that I chose Chambless Plumbing when my heating element went out on my water heater. They responded promptly and provided fast professional service that had our hot water going again in no time! Highly recommend and will call on again!

Honest, Dependable, Knowledgeable, and Reasonable prices. Re-piped my home in no-time along with hooking my icemaker up and changing out the shower fixtures in my bathrooms. I will definitely be calling this guy for all future plumbing issues.

It's hard as heck to find a decent plumber these days but I hit the jackpot. Bubba knows his stuff, and works diligently to get the job done. I'm usually skeptical of strangers doing work in my home but Bubba was highly recommended to me by several people and I see why. Character and knowledge goes a long way, if you need quality plumbing work done at a reasonable price look no further.

Had an unexpected emergency this morning, googled this number called and Bubba came right out (yes on a Saturday). He doesn't mind talking you through the process, and also recommends way to prevent future problems. I didn't even have to close my eyes when he gave me the overall cost. I'm definitely thankful for Bubba on this Saturday morning. He gets 10s all across the board, will definitely use again and recommend to anyone.
He came to the house in a timely manner and he fixed my water heater fast. Now it’s working perfectly with no leaks.
Very professional service and the best quality of work.

I highly recommend Chambless Plumbing for any of your plumbing needs! Bubba is an outstanding, very knowledgeable and honest man! He communicates well with his customers and I never had to worry about a thing. It was an overall very great experience!

reviews.review_text: Quickly responded with a quote that was fair. They completed the repairs quickly without exceeding the quote. Everyone was friendly and professional. I have recommended them to all my friends. A+ Thank you Mr. Howard.

Awesome he is a a great plumber and guy

reviews.review_text: Great guy! Honest and reliable!

We were smelling propane around our gas grill at our lake house.  We called Adam and he found the problem immediately--squirrels had chewed holes in our gas grill hose.  Adam replaced the hose and checked to be sure everything was in working order.  Definitely recommend!
Made a call and was out within a few hours. Removed and installed the new water heater and made sure everything was up to code. Very efficient. Well pleased with the service.
Hands down the best!! He does everything he can to help you out and will make sure to fix you up!!

Adam was great! He installed a gas fireplace insert from woodburning fireplace. Took time to explain everything so we understood how to work the fireplace insert. He came back to check and be sure i was doing it correctly.  Patient man! I recommend him to everyone.

Great service! Quick to respond and get the job done. I have used them several times and received top quality results with no issues.

I would highly recommend using this company!
Adam is honest and always does the job right. He is a hard worker and does everything he can to satisfy his customers needs! 10/10 would recommend to anybody needing some gas work done
Adam is a honest guy.  Will take care of your gas needs no problem.
Needed help finishing my install of a tankless water heater and Adam came right away and helped me get set up. I appreciate the work he did and he was very helpful! Highly recommend him

I worked with Adam from Churchill’s Gas Service and Repair LLC for the installation of a propane tank and the conversion of my natural fireplace to gas logs. From the outset, Adam was the epitome of professionalism. He answered the phone, explained options and the work to be performed.   Once we had all the materials, he arrived right on schedule, which is a rarity these days given "lake time", and got straight to work.

He took the time to explain the operation of the new system, ensuring that I was comfortable and familiar with it before he left.

High quality and professional.
Adam is a stand up guy. Shows up when he says and completes the work in a timely fashion. Very affordable and professional.
On time and professional

Does very good and pin point work does not rush through the job no job is to big or to small and does very quality work and is very respectful to what the customer wants and goes the extra to make sure customer is satisfied, I would highly recommend Churchill gas service..!!!
The best of the best!! Great prices, very friendly, and fast service! Very reliable and does great work!! Highly recommend!!!
Great costumer service. Highly recommend Adam for gas repair needs.
Amazing service. Adam is very knowledgeable at what he is doing and will work non stop to make sure you are taken care of. He is very professional and kind. Highly recommend his services.
Absolutely the best in the business! Would 100% recommend! Honest trustworthy and fair!
Always shows up when he says he will and does a good job.
Adam and staff are very efficient and professional.  Excellent service! Highly recommend.
Always great service! Fast and reliable and the best all around! Highly recommend!

Adam came through when another company failed me!!!!  He called me back quickly after I left him a message, he showed up when he said he would (early in fact) to look at my job, and then he did the work while it rained on him!  I couldn't have asked for a better experience, and he was super nice on top of it.  Integrity, honesty, commitment, he has it all!

Adam and is crew is all class. He is fast and dependable. Cleans up every mess and doesn’t leave a trace. Every time I’ve called or text, he’s shown up the same or next day and always reply’s that day. He answers all my questions and his work has never been an issue. He’s done 4-5 of my projects now. As long as he’s in business, he will have mine. I would 10/10 recommend him.
I’ve used Adam on several occasions and he’s extremely knowledgeable about what he does. We highly recommend him!!

Adam Churchill is very knowledgeable in this field. He is quick to respond and showes up when he says he will. He is Honest and Trustworthy. He is professional and great to work with. He was on time and finished the job when he said he would. He did great work. I would definitely use him again and would recommend him to anyone.
If you want excellent service with a company that is trustworthy and honest, Churchill Gas and Service can take great care of you. I recommend them to anyone. Quality work that you can count on.

They came to my house and installed a tank-less water heater. The spot that I wanted the water heater was kinda in a tight spot, but they did not hesitate to accommodate my request. They were very professional and even cleaned up after themselves.  A definite 5 star from me!!
The best!

Have used Churchills a few times now for my tankless gas water heater. In the coldest months or winter, I had frozen pipes going to my water heater. Adam was wide open running service calls and didn’t have the time to get to my house right then. He jumped on FaceTime and walked me through step by step what to do to get me back going. And has since began servicing my equipment to make sure I don’t have issues in the future. Highly recommend him to anyone who has gas needs!

Best gas man around love my gas tank less water heater he goes the mile and beyond. Great knowledge and know how.  He's from Walker County and very dependable! Not to mention one heck of a little brother !!!
Churchills Gas Service and Repair LLC is hands down the best! Will go above and beyond to make sure your needs are met. Quality work done in a timely manner!
Best in the buisness!!! Call day or night he will be there when he says he will! Honest days work for honest days pay highly recommend Churchill’s for all your gas repairs or new installs
Great service and great prices.  Very honest man.

There prices are better then alot of places and it is a local ran and owned shop. Good prices and they are a whole lot cheaper than any of the big box stores. they have what you want if not they will get it

Super helpful and friendly

Came out same day to fix a leak in our kitchen sink. Very professional, left no mess. Took the time to help me locate the shut off valve for the new home and made sure I was comfortable with how to turn it off. Will use again for any plumbing issues should they arise.

He volunteered to come out at 10 pm that night to look at it agin. We settled on him returning in the morning to check the issue. He came out the very next day to fix the issue and even reached out several weeks later to make sure things were still running right. I highly recommend him for your plumbing needs!

We had a clogged pipe under the house. Mr Harrison was abel to figure it out and fix it quickly. I had called other plumbers but all were gonna be at least a week to help my family. Mr Harrison came the same day i called and fix our issue. Highly recommend will definitely use in the future.
I have had to call Mark twice now,  both times he came as soon as he could and got my problem solved, I would recommend Harrison plumbing to anyone who needs work done.
Mark is awesome! Fixed a nasty pipe break under my home and I couldn’t be happier with results and fair price!  I recommend him highly!
Mark, did a great job for us and was willing to help on a side issue while he was here!

I 10/10 recommend Harrisons Plumbing. Our water heater was leaking and Mark made a special trip between jobs to come out and look at it. The company I called first couldn't come out for two days! Thankfully, Mark was able to fix it on the spot but he told me if it needed to be replaced he would have made sure it got done at some point that day. He didn't want us to have to be without hot water all weekend. He also took a look at an ongoing issue we had and gave an honest assessment. Mark Harrison was very nice and professional and extremely reasonable. I absolutely will contact him the next time we need a plumber!

We had a toilet backing up on Saturday & a snake wouldn’t do the job. Called Mark at Harrison’s Plumbing & he understood our urgency & came within a few hours! Unstopped the outside pipe & had the toilet working in no time. Easy to work with, responsible price & I Highly recommend him!
Great job, very professional, very responsive.
Couldn’t have asked for better service. Would definitely recommend him to anyone needing this type of work.
Mr. Harrison performs excellent work.  Knowledgeable!  Efficient!  Great quality and value!  Have used him numerous times and will again!
Harrison plumbing is a great choice if you’re looking for an honest hard working plumber. He’s my go to for any and all my plumbing needs.
Prompt, polite, and reasonably priced. Excellent work. Repaired a broken pipe in our front yard.
Mark always takes care of me and my plumbing issues like family which cant be beat ! Thanks Mark
Very reliable and affordable 5 stars!!!!!
Great work! Fast response.

Mark is awesome he shows up when he says he is honest knows what he is doing and he is a hoot very real. He is reasonable and backs his word and his work. Very impressed with expertise and customer  service.  Found my plumbing problem!

Called All Leak Detection LLC to find a leak on our water line.  Water company reported 25g+ leak per hour but no visible sign.  John arrived and very quickly found the leak.  Very professional, courteous, and very skilled.  A true godsend.  Next time I've got a leak, I'm calling him back.  If you got a leak, All Leak Detection is the one to call.

The first leak detection company we called told us it would be a week before they could send a technician out. We then called All Leak Detection. John, the owner came out that day and located our leak and charged us a lot less than we were quoted by the other company.
Came out right away and got me all squared away.  Thank you!

Robbie was great! He was able to schedule me quickly. Great price for service call. He found the issue immediately and fixed it fast. Very professional, efficient and kind. I would highly recommend him to anyone!! He's knowledgeable and a plumber you would want to have!!
Great service, on time and just in time! Very happy with the professional and friendly service provided. Would highly recommend to anyone who wants it done right the first time!

They were very friendly. They were able to get me serviced the same day. Very professional. They had my washer cut offs repaired in 15 minutes and my toilet working in 30 minutes. Will definitely be using again. I highly recommend them. Thanks guys
Highly recommend!  There was a leak on my side of the meter so I had to turn off all water. Robbie was prompt, quickly made the repair and got my water on.  Very professional with reasonable prices.

Robby & his team at Piper's plumbing were wonderful! Prompt, professional, and affordable- there's nothing better! We will use Piper's Plumbing for all our plumbing needs!

If I can put 10 stars I would. Robby was on time, and very knowledgeable about the work process of the busted water lines in my yard. He’s clean on his work and quick turn over. Not to mention this is a family owned business and that right there speaks for itself. Thanks again Pipers Plumbing!

Pipers Plumbing was very professional and was reasonably priced for their service. We used them several times for our plumbing needs as we can count on them to get the job done right. Robby is very friendly and great at what he does! Will definitely use pipers plumbing in the future!

The most professional and experienced plumber I’ve had the actual pleasure of hiring! Won’t talk to you like you’re stupid and is actually on time with the best communication skills I’ve seen in a while. Would recommend. Did an amazing job fixing my sink!

Pipers came out today and did a fantastic job!  Technician was on time, very kind and reasonably priced. Especially pleased he did not feel like he “talked down” to me as a female like other service providers have done. Would absolutely recommend this company to everyone!

Ron’s time in the plumbing industry, relationships, and time in the community make him an invaluable resource.  Over the past several months and especially during COVID shortages he has provided what seems to be an invaluable resource and that is peace of mind.  I can ask him to resolve anything from replacing a garbage disposal to fixing a fireplace (gas pipe) without having to follow-up with him.  He gets the job done, often goes beyond expectation, and is quick to communicate…even when he just got out of the hospital.  I love this guy, and he reminds me why I miss my Southern Americans and their gracious inviting charm! -David Lanfkord Maj, USAF (ret)
Great services,  He show up when I couldn't get anyone else. He's been so helpful to my husband and I

They’re going to help me customize my enclosed trailer next with some shelving and lights.

These guys were very prompt, professional, and prices were very reasonable! They fixed the problem the very first time. I highly recommend!
Wonderful service, quick response time. Saved us from the hot July heat! 🙌🏻
Hunter came out to my home shortly after I called him and diagnosed the problem and fixed it. I will be using them again and I heavily recommend them.

reviews.review_text: James does excellent work.  It is very affordable,  and I will be using his services again.

So I woke up to a nightmare of a
Disaster in my bathroom once arrived satisfaction began they were quick efficient polite well mannered James Deardorff was my #Hero I highly recommend their plumbing services for all plumbing services needs five out of five stars 100% satisfaction Thank you guys for all your hard work and dedication to making sure that my home was dead again safe From water damage
Sometime leaks are hard to find and alot of times there even worse to fix but im glad i called james to help me out. Real good guy.

When my pipe burst I panicked assuming it was going to cost me a fortune to fix.  I'm a first time home owner and this was my first issue I have had to have repaired.  My home warranty company set up my appointment with Mikes.

We’ve had Mike’s people out several times for different issues. I am always pleased at their knowledge and professionalism.  All the guys are very nice and prices reasonable.  I won’t call anyone else to do jobs for us!

I'm reviewing the plumbing service I received from Mike's Plumbing and Electric.  They were dispatched via my home warranty company.  They responded quickly to my issue, showed up on time, and called me when they were enroute.  The technician was polite, courteous, and took the time to let me walk him through the issue we were having with our bathtub.  He fixed the problem promptly and even gave me a few pointers to help me prevent similar issues in the future.

I've seen a few bad reviews from people based on their "home warranty" and their repair not being covered.  Whether you dispatch a plumber, electrician, or AC specialist, they can only cover items that your home warranty company lets them cover, based on your contract (that you picked).  People should read their contracts first before taking their frustrations out on a local business.  Cheaper home warranties cover less items, go figure.

Robert and Jeremy came out today and did a wonderful job. They came in and had our problem fixed in no time. Very knowledgeable and efficient. I would recommend this company to anyone needing repairs.
I had the pleasure of having Mike's son over to fix a leak.  He was pleasurable, courteous and fast.  The cost was absolutely fair.  Great service in Dothan.  Thank you.

Absolutely will use this service again! Very good communication in quoting job & continued communicating every step of project. Already planning addition of water filtration service w/ this busines!

reviews.review_text: Excellent plumbing company all the way around. I had a hot water line break under concrete. They came up with a plan and had everything fixed, from first call until completed, in under two hours. These guys are timely, honest, intelligent, and efficient.

Chris and an assistant came to my home the day I called Delta Plumbing and made every effort to detect the source of a sewer-type odor we have smelled for the past several days in just one bathroom.  He was professional in his approach to finding it though he was unable to detect the source.  He recommended a smoke test and provided a written estimate of $550 for the first 2 hours, saying he was sure it would take less than that time to do the test.

Scott was extremely helpful, quick and reported back on his work and included photos throughout the process.  The pricing was reasonable and the work was completed on-time and within the quoted rates.  I would definitely recommend this company and would hire Scott to do additional work when needed!  Thank you!
Mr. Anthony  was patient and very helpful. This was a great experience thanks to him. Thanks Anthony!

Had a water leak in our front yard discovered late yesterday afternoon. It was slight, or so it seemed, so I waited until this morning to find a plumber.
Used Delta's online appointment scheduler early this morning, given that they replaced our HW Heater a few years ago. Evelyn called me at 8a to let me know that someone would be out asap to take a look.

Anthony showed up around 915, took a quick look at things and got to work digging where the leak was springing from. After about 2.5 hours he was all done. Great customer service, clearly explained the issue and solution and quickly made the repair. Thankful for companies like Delta! Thanks again Anthony.
William showed up on time and got the job done.....thank you Will
Scott was very knowledgeable and pleasant when he arrived.
Nathan is the best and the greatest plumber I ever work with.  Thanks Nathan
Scott was great on time came did my estimate and diagnostic explained everything in detail despite I have been a mess since this leak .

Delta Plumbing and our plumber Nathan did an excellent job!  Nathan was professional and knowledable. I would definately recommend!
I Greatly Appreciate the Customer Service and Education on Septic and plumbing Equipment..

What an awesome experience. In the process of selling my father's home and didn't know it had a septic tank as opposed to a public sewer system. I was told that any plumbing service could inspect and provide the clearance letter needed for selling the home. Thanks to my realtor for doing the leg work and calling different plumbing companies, he gave me Delta's number, and because I had used them in the past I felt comfortable scheduling the inspection for my father's home.

Calling and speaking with Ms. Opal to set up the appointment went without a hitch as she was so very courteous and took the time to answer my questions and was very detailed in the information that she needed as well as the work that would be performed. She even sent a follow up email to let me know that she received my signed authorization form that I emailed back to her....I didn't even have to call and ask....WOW.

The pleasant experience didn't stop there, Mr. Trace called me once he arrived to the property and then called me back to let me know the results of the inspection. Because I was out of town taking care of my mother, Mr. Trace could have told me anything, but yet he was honest to confirm that the tank was in very good condition and didn't need any service.

Thank you to both Ms. Opal and Mr. Trace for your awesome customer service, your attention to detail, and keeping the customer top of mind!! Awesome!
Very courteous and knowledgeable when explaining the issues and resolves where possible. Thank you Jerry
Anthony was a pleasure to work with. Very informative and took the time to diagnose and determine the best path forward. Would hire again, no issues!

Ivan was incredible!  What looked like it should be an easy task ended up being alot more complicated.  After attempting a variety of options, he settled on the best one to achieve my request.  He was fantastic.  I highly recommend Ivan.  If I need anything in the future, I will request Ivan.  Thank you Ivan!

AWESOME AWESOME........ Jacob & Delta Plumbing are 5 star plus in my book.   We had a serious plumbing and called Delta and they were here very quickly since it was an emergency and we didn't want out brand new floor and bathroom ruined because of the back up that was caused from 64 year old cast iorn pipes rusting and breaking apart.    They were here 2 days assessing the job, was here early in the day Wednesday and started the job.  Every piece of dirt was put back into place.....lol .......and the made special care of not tearing up a new baby tree that had just been planted recently.  They doubled checked the water to make sure it was running threw the new pipes properly, had me run water threw the washing machine several times so that everything was flowing correctly and not backing up again.  The speediness and care they gave me was top notch.  Everything they had to do or needed to do they told me first and asked if i wanted to do it and yes we did it.  And I couldn't be happier.  In the past we have used several different plumbers but no one has ever taken the time to explain everything to us and give us the option as to what we wanted to do, and give me the respect I deserve being that its our house and our money.  No pressure or pushing us into a decision we needed to think about it and go over with him on.   I totally recommend Delta Plumbing for any and all plumbing problems they would be the one's I'd call and "will" call.  Thank you Jacob for your help, your kindness and concern of what could have happened in the very near future had we not had all those pipes replaced.  Thank you Delta
Great guys and they were flexible on the price.  For sure, they will be the first company I call next time!

I will 100% not only use Delta again for future issues, but I will be specifically asking for Chris as well. 5 star company and 5 star specialist!

The problem was quickly diagnosed and the repair was completed in less than an hour.  I highly recommend Delta Plumbing.

Robert is great.  He communicated well by calling me when he is on his way to the job.  He gave me clear and concise direction on how to prevent down time with our Tank-less water heaters. I highly recommend Delta Plumbing.

Ron came out right away to help with an emergency issue the septic system in the house we rented was starting to leak water out into the basement carpet. Luckily he fixed it and everything is working great! Definitely recommend him!

reviews.review_text: Great guys and great service. They were here on time and did a great job!

Mario did a complete demo and remodel of our guest bath.  He was very prompt and wasted no time while he was on this project.
