We found Gary and Carlisle Contracting with a Google search and an answered prayer. Half way through building our forever home, we had to part ways with the builder. Our home was built to the point where sheetrock was hung and taped. From there we were on our own to finish: paint, flooring, tile, cabinets, countertops, all electrical and plumbing fixtures/trim out, interior doors and trim, shake, soffit, gutters, concrete, septic tank, landscaping, water heater installation, HVAC and gas final, and appliance installation.
We were blessed to locate the original subs for electrical, plumbing, and gas and they returned to complete their work.
Enter Gary. Gary and his team worked with us to complete over 4500sq ft of paint, hardwood flooring, tile (floors and shower), interior doors and trim, shake, soffit, gutters, concrete and septic tank installation. A sentence does not quite depict the magnitude of the job Gary and his team took on. We quoted the work in Sep 2022 with a hard completion deadline in Feb 2023 for all work - Gary’s Team and all of the original subcontractors.
In addition to scheduling his team, Gary also coordinated with the original subs for scheduling to keep things on track to meet our deadline.
Gary and his team were Professional, On Time, and On Budget throughout our project.
They not only took pride in their work, they cared about us and the vision we had for our home. They used their knowledge and experience to make recommendations of alternatives and were graciously willing to go through trial and error with us when we had to change course on design or material for accent walls, fireplace wall design, and ensuring we had the perfect stain color for our front door and cedar posts.
Gary was with us for every step through final inspection for occupancy.
Simply put, Gary was a Godsend. Finishing a house build without a builder could have been unbelievably stressful. Finding a builder or contractor to come after another builder with a fixed budget and deadline could have been unbelievably stressful.
But God. He sent us Gary. We are forever Grateful and forever Thankful for Gary and Carlisle Contracting.

Josh is amazing and we are so happy we called him. He worked quickly and got, not only our water running back into our house because of a busted main line, but also fixed a leaking spicket and outside water hose line.

Very knowledgeable and explained what he was doing. Josh you are the best, made me feel safe and checked all her plumbing so i didn't have to worry about something happening while i wasn’t there. Tell your boss I said you deserve a raise.
Responded to my call within a few hours. I felt like they are very reasonably priced compared to the last time I had to call someone. No more leaks and he cleaned my kitchen drain while he was there.

I am Sorry to Inform You Mr Whitlock Passed away last year He was a good man that would help anyone in Need He had a good Heart & is now in the arms of the Father 👌 Saved my house from catching Fire Great Service Came Immediately Half my power was out pulled circuit box & several plugs Found the Problem with Ease Even supplied the switch Very Reliable Service I Highly Recommend Them

Front door replacement, extensive front porch column repairs, side door frame repair, interior painting repairs, masonry repairs, vinyl siding repairs and garage dry wall / molding repairs, porch concrete painting, aluminum siding for the porch columns. Lol Yes I was the do it yourselfer, humbled and pleased.  Went above and beyond.  Great price and great guy.  Plan on hiring in the near future for a few projects.  Thanks Jacob, we appreciate you.

Jake and his crew cleaned, installed barriers, painted and rescreened my deck and replaced and painted some bad wood around my garage doors. It looks like new house. Thanks so much for doing it all.  It looks great!

We used Hatcher plumbing for a total revamp of our 1960’s house’s plumbing. He gutted the old drains and replaced all of the cast iron with a completely redesigned pvc drain system all the way to the septic tank.  He designed a new vent system so that no pipes would show up through the roof sections at the front of the house. He also created a new water supply system throughout the house using PEX. He even replaced some pvc on our pool pump! Sims gave a lot of great advice along the way and helped us overcome several obstacles in our remodeling. We will be having him return shortly to hook up all of the fixtures as soon as the drywall is complete. Sims is very personable and passionate about doing quality work.  Hatcher Plumbing has done us a fantastic service!
Very professional and quality work! If you want a bad plumber Mr. Hatcher ain't it. Hes a good plumber with good work ethic, I definitely recommend him!

ken and his team are doing a water damage insurance claim for me.  They are doing a fantastic job.  Ken has gone out of his way to make sure everything is done the way I want it and answering all my questions and concerns.  I highly recommend him to anyone who needs a contractor.

What a great Plumbing Company!

Woke up yesterday morning to discover a leak was coming water heater which damaged my bathroom ceiling.  Water reclamation service (DryTech) got us in touch with Carter. Carter knows his stuff.  When you have a plumbing issue and you want it fixed call CJ plumbing and gas.  Thanks for your prompt service.
He went above and beyond anything I had expected. I will  use him for all my plumbing needs.

We highly recommend Carter Johnson and C.J. plumbing and gas.  He is extremely knowledgeable about all plumbing and gas problems and quickly resolves them.  He is honest and kind.  We use him every single time we ever have any plumbing or gas needs.  We also recommend him to all of our friends.

I recently had a leak and when I called Cater came out the same day and completed the repair.  I also asked him to repipe my house and he did that too by himself in two days.  All I have to say is WOW and this is my plumber always. Carter is great and goes above and beyond in his work.
Carter does a great job and takes time to explain all of your options.  Highly recommend!
Outstanding job and service! Carter showed up on time and did everything he said he would do in a timely manner. He was very friendly, knowledgeable and we will definitely be using him again.

The best and most relieable Plumber in Shelby County. Carter thank you so much for everything you did in order to complete my emergency repairs. Please dont hesitate to call this man for any plumbing or gas needs.

Outstanding service and communication! Call Carter for all your plumbing and gas needs! He replaced the wax ring and completely reworked both toilets, checked my water heater and water pressure. Carter even left a curb side key (and picked one up for me to have on hand) and showed me how to turn the water main off because he had an already scheduled pressing job to do first. He is very conscientious and left no mess whatsoever. I will definitely be calling C.J. Plumbing & Gas for all future plumbing and gas  jobs and repairs. Highly recommend!
He was awesome!! Took his time to make sure everything was done well. He was detailed in looking over everything before he got started and throughout the job. We could not be happier.

I had a leaky water heater and I called CJ plumbing. I had gotten his business card from someone at work. He came over and not only inspected the water heater, but thoroughly check the pressure through out  my home. He took the time to explain exactly what was going on. I scheduled a day for him to come and replace the water heater. I recently had surgery and couldn't get around very well. Most of the time that he was here I was in bed recovering. He, was so professional that I was comfortable with him. He, not only did the work he was being paid to do. He went beyond that and tightened a faucet that he noticed was in need of attention.
I am so appreciative that God sent the right person. I  highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas.
Fast and friendly service. Will definitely use again in the future.
Amazing customer service,  no bologna, let’s you know exactly what’s wrong and explains what he can do to fix it.  Carter did an amazing job.  Highly recommend!
Carter did another fine job at our house today by installing a new kitchen faucet. Carter does excellent work and I would be happy to recommend him anytime. Thanks again Carter.

This is the second time we've called Carter about a plumbing problem. The first time he came to fix a water pressure problem. He was very professional and did an excellent job. The second time we called him to fix a clog that was about 35 ft down in our kitchen drain. He was able to clear the clog and made sure it was perfect before he left. I highly recommend him. He has fair prices and does the job quickly and professionally. I will definitely call him again if we have any plumbing  problems or needs.
Came out and and excellent job on our issue! Will use again and recommend him highly!

Mr.  Johnson  went above and beyond what I had expected. He came to my home to fix a major problem and was very thorough in diagnosing and discussing my options. (Water leak in the concrete slab) He was knowledgeable, helpful, and professional. I was impressed that he took his time and checked EVERYTHING! He gave me a price that almost knocked me over BECAUSE it was MORE THAN FAIR. (WAY less than the “national average “ to do that kind of job) not only that AFTER he quoted me the price and did the rather large job he fixed a couple of minor problems for me .....he said “it won’t take but a few extra  minutes and it’s no problem ” (he had already been here for a few hours!)  I will be using him for any plumbing needs I have in the future and I highly recommend him. He is knowledgeable, helpful, reasonable, fair, kind, and the quality of his work is excellent.
CJ is so Awesome. He was on time , he listened to all details if i could give him more stars i would. He really helped me out in my time of need. Thank you so much CJ i HIGHLY recommend him.

Carter came out the same day I called. He took care of all of our problems and I would recommend him over any other plumber company in the area! He is knowledgeable, personable, and makes sure you understand what is happening - thanks again for your service!
Highly recommend
5 Stars
Carter was amazing! He came out the same day that we called and took care of the problem! Definitely recommend him if you are in need of a plumber!

Carter arrived on time and was very efficient. He took time to explain what he was doing and answered all of my questions. Pricing was reasonable and I would definately call him again for plumbing needs.
Did a great job would reccomend !

Carter recently helped us with several plumbing issues. We appreciated his attention to detail. He let us in on what he suspected, and what each possibility might require. Carter was on time, persistent and thorough, and went above and beyond to help us feel confident that we wouldn’t face these same problems again.

If you’re looking for a great plumber at a reasonable price look no further. He did an excellent job with my plumbing needs and was on time and zero hidden charges like most plumbers out there. If you have any plumbing needs do yourself a favor and skip the other hacks and call Carter Johnson definitely won’t regret it

Carter was fantastic!!  I truly can’t say enough great things about him!  His dedication to fixing my plumbing issues and not leaving me without water was very impressive.  The company I first found on the internet was going to wait 6 days before they even came to diagnose the problem.  Carter was here within a couple of hours and stayed until we had water again...into the night! His prices were absolutely fair and he seems like a great guy that I completely trust in my home.  I’ve used him three times since my initial emergency for some plumbing updates and he has continued to impress with every visit!!  I would absolutely recommend him!
Thank you Carter for installing my whole house water filter. You provided excellent service along with beating your competitors price by $115.00. Thank you again.

Carter was excellent to work with! He was right on time and quickly diagnosed my main issue. He openly admitted there *might" be a 2nd issue, but there would be a different need than he could provide (e.g tile work), so he prepared me for that possible next step. Good news - as of 1 month later I have ZERO evidence of any water and Carter's plumbing work saved the day - and I haven't forked over any $$$ for extra tile/construction work!!!
From a value perspective, I don't have any comparable dollars. That said, he was very transparent how he charged and provided a clear bill. I did not at all feel like he took advantage of the job based upon the work he performed and time he spent. He was quite thorough, and seemingly very honest and transparent in his diagnosis and solution, and quite knowledgeable of his trade!!!
On top of his work, he was friendly and courteous. He was dog-friendly and was very affectionate to our sweet Peggy. ♥️
Thank you, Carter, for great work!

We had an absolutely amazing experience with Carter. We had a nasty clog that gave us fits for quite awhile. Carter came by shortly after calling him. He worked for so long on our problem and even worked on other problems he found while working on the initial problem. He was thorough and explained  what he was doing and why which we greatly appreciated. If we ever have another issue, he’ll be our first call. I’d recommend him 10/10 to anyone.
Detailed

Hardworking, HONEST, and dependable, reliable, knowledgeable, professional...I could go on for a while!  Carter quickly responded to my residence due to an under the slab pipe leak (which had water seeping up through my floors).  He thoroughly explained what the "approach and fix" would be and set me up with all the additional help (detection and remediation)I'd need.  He went straight to work on the leak and did not stop until it was fixed.  I would absolutely, highly recommend!

I highly recommend this company. Carter came out to give us a quote and was very professional. We went with him because he definitely knew what he was talking about and was much more reasonable than some of the big name companies. He changed out 30 foot of cast iron rotted pipe over to pvc and replaced pressure reducing valve and installed a new cut off valve. Needless to see, everything is working great now. He is my permanent plumber now.

Philip P
Would give 10 stars if I could. CJ provides quality service with professionalism. Explains and breaks down what the issue is to the customer. Will do work with him in the future.
Carter was prompt and very professional. He did excellent work and it was much appreciated. I will be using him in the future for sure. He will always be at the top of my list. Thanks again Carter!
I highly recommend CJ Plumbing and Gas. Carter is prompt, does quality work, and offers fair prices. I am so pleased to find a plumber that I can count on and trust.
Absolutely a great  plumber! His work has cut our water bill over half the last few months. We will never call another plumber again.

Carter has been out to our house for a variety of reasons from indoor plumbing to irrigation system issues.  He’s also worked on my parent’s RV plumbing!  He definitely knows what he’s doing, reasonable, and timely.  I’ve recommended him to several friends and I wouldn’t do that if I didn’t trust him and believe he was the best man for the job.

Carter has helped us complete projects in preparation of the sale of our home. Whenever we contacted him about a job, he scheduled us quickly and arrived on time. Carter’s prices are competitive and his work is solid.

We’ve used Carter multiple times in our prior home and our current one. He is professional, reliable, and friendly. He schedules you quickly, all work is done in a timely manner, and he always cleans up after his work is completed. I highly recommend him - you can’t go wrong!

Robert & Lisa Shapiro highly recommend C J Plumbing and Gas Alabaster (Carter Johnson) for any all plumbing or gas repairs or installs. We requested a list of items to be repaired, checked & installed. As with any request for repairs, the list grew once he arrived. Carter was knowledgeable & pleasant with the additional repairs. He worked two solid days to ensure all was in proper working order. Carter is the only Plumber & Gas Fitter we will contact. We are elated with his expertise & excellent customer service.

Called Carter on a Saturday to come take a look at a leak in my ceiling.   He came over in less than 30mins from the call.   After a very thorough investigation, he diagnosed the issue and pointed out some other issues that really needed attention.  He is very detail oriented and very helpful.   He fixed the issues and now I have a house that is in perfect plumbing order.   Thank you Carter for your quick response and an awesome job on my house.   I highly reccomend Carter for any plumbing needs.

Boxcar, Chris Seals is the only handymen I trust and use. He has done several jobs for me in the last two years since I moved here. I am very fortunate to have him help me. There are so many scams and bad people out there. Chris does an excellent job, detail oriented, tries to save money the best he can. Chris has helped me through emergencies and always shows up even though he is extremely busy. His skills as an electrician has been amazing in my kitchen in my open cabinets. Chris has the ability to “ work out” problems in my home that I wanted but didn’t think it was possible. Very good work, trustworthy and great pricing!
Awesome, Awesome, awesome! He was fast, professional, and fair. 10/10, will definitely be giving him a call in the future!

I request Chris  Seals to installed 4 poach columns in front of my house and he did an excellent job.  He did everything we agreed upon to complete the job and then some.  He took his time and ensured the job was done correctly.  He always kept me informed as what was he doing even when he departed the job to pick up supplies.  His price was very reasonable.  I strongly recommend him.  I plan to use his services again.
Very good

We have used Chris on numerous jobs over the last few years. He shows up.on time. Does quality work and cleans up when finished. I highly recommend.

David Edmonds
Edmonds Home Improvement

I needed help mounting my tv on my tv stand. The movers didn’t leave the screws in the box when I moved. I called Chris and he did a great job getting me the screws and putting the TV up. I knew I would need help in the future for things around the house as I just moved here and don’t really know anyone yet. So glad I found Chris! He was helpful and very professional! Will be calling him again anytime I need things done!

color-me-mine-painting-home-repairs.business name: Color me mine painting & home repairs

reviews.review_text:
Kyle and his son Aidan done a fabulous job for me and my home! Very professional!
100% recommend!

I had tile put down in my bathroom recently and had the "popcorn" taken off the ceiling and repainted. Richard Berry does excellent work and has a great work ethic! He was always punctual, and that speaks volumes these days. He was friendly and gave me a fair price. He was also very neat and cleaned up when all work was done. I am extremely pleased!  I would not hesitate to call on him again for my next job!

Richard Berry did an awesome job with my very high ceiling rooms.  He went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect before finishing the job.  He used good quality paint and supplies to give the exact finish I wanted.  Very nice, honest, reliable and reasonable compared to many others who gave me quotes. I will contact again for home repairs and painting.  Linda C.
Highly recommend! Excellent quality work and shows up on time every day. Very pleased with our interior paint job (walls and trim) and looking forward to using Color Me Mine again in the future!

After being quoted by two well known roofing companies that I needed a new roof,  Raymond was able to find the leak and fixed the problem.  What he thought was initially the problem he later discovered was a short cut the builder had done to the roof and fixed that problem as well.  I would definitely recommend Raymond and would use again.

Built a beautiful deck for our 1958 bungalow. Every old house comes with special surprises; Shamrock upgraded our old porch foundation and redesigned the existing structure to suit our needs, without charging extra for the additional work. We’re so pleased with the results!

Mr. Roop was hired to finish some renovations to several posts on my front porch, back patio, and shed. He did a great job despite several issues that made the job difficult and unique. He remained patient with changes I made mid-way through the job and made several trips to pick up materials needed.  He was very polite and patient and was very flexible with his schedule to accommodate me. He stayed within budget which was very reasonable.

johnston-home-repair-and-remodeling-llc.business name: Johnston Home Repair and Remodeling LLC

reviews.review_text: I got Johnston Home Repair and Remodeling to install my floors, baseboards and to paint inside of my house in Calhoun. They were very professional and did a great job in the quick time frame I needed it done in. It was the complete opposite of the bad experiences that I’ve had in the past with other contractors. It was a great remodel and I have definitely found my local handy man that I’m using from now on.
Johnston Home Repair & Remodeling really outdone themselves with my pantry rebuild! Looks great and loved the professionalism. Will have them coming back to do some Handyman work here soon!

Anytime and everytime we've called upon Anything Plumbing, they've answered and did the jobs quickly and at a reasonable cost. Today, with a full schedule, they were able to fit us in between calls and explained to us what we needed to do since he didn't have my particular part on his truck. We were able to get the part that night and fix it because of his instructions. If we couldn't get the part, he was coming back to fix it in the morning. They will continue to get my business each and every time because they treat us like they want our business and not like they are looking to get rich off of a job. If you are looking for reasonable and reliable, I recommend using Anything Plumbing.
Awesome service, fast repair, arrived asap and fixed a few other issues along the way. Repeat customer, my go to plumbing expert! Highly reccomended.

Update: second time using this wonderful company. They were able to replace our water heater quickly and did an excellent job. 10/10 on skill and service

So thankful for Jarrett! He was so kind and professional, and he was able to help us with a pretty big water leak. Will definitely recommend to friends

Highly recommend Anything Plumbing! We had a leak in an unknown location. They came out quickly and found and repaired the leak quickly.  They were also much more thorough and affordable than another plumber we had out previously. They took great care in ensuring our yard was kept neat and clean throughout the process. Anything Plumbing will be the first people we call for future plumbing needs.

Anything Plumbing replaced our water heater.They were able to readily schedule our appointment, arrived promptly, were pleasant, communicative, skilled, and efficient.  They charged a fair price for good honest work. Will call again for future plumbing needs.

Has been able to show up and take care of any problem I've had on our properties within a very reasonable amount of time. And the follow through was fantastic, never had to recall for a job, done first time every time.

Awesome performance by AP!  Tremendous knowledge, very friendly, extremely good communication, punctual, and a work ethic second to none.  AP did more than they promised and all the work was high quality.  Highly recommend!!
Great service, very professional, and reasonably priced! Will definitely be using for future needs!
Jarrett completed the job quickly and professionally. All the feeling and benefit of a small business and personal attention. I highly recommend AP.
Jarrett came out on a Sunday to repair supply line to kitchen sink. He was on time, professional, courteous, and performed quality work! It was a positive experience and I would recommend.
Great customer service and top quality plumbing work.

This is the first time I've used Anything Plumbing and they surpassed my expectations with their professionalism and quality of work. Thank you!

Sincerely,

A lifetime customer

Jarrett at Anything Plumbing was very professional from start to finish. He gave me a 45 minute heads up of when he would be there which gave me time to get home to meet him. He was very thorough with his troubleshooting and quickly figured out my issue. Not only was he quick to figure it out but he had my pressure regulator valve replaced and the hot water heater leak repaired in just under 2 hours. I wouldn't hesitate to call him again in the future with any plumbing needs. Thanks Jarrett!

I called Anything plumbing on a Sunday evening and he was very helpful over the phone. He came out first thing Monday morning. Fixed my slap leak in a few hours. He even filled hole with concrete. Jarrett did a wonderful job. Would highly recommend. Thank you Anything Plumbing for getting my family water again!

Responded quickly. Came out same day I called, Monday. Was back on Wednesday to replace 17 year old water heater. Updated the plumbing as well as installed Rheeme 50 gallon. Price was very reasonable, less than other quote we got and certainly more expedient. They were professional, responsive and really nice people. I highly recommend Anything Plumbing.

Had a heating element die in my tankless water heater. Was absolutely a consummate professional and was even early for the service call. His pricing was fair and he did a wonderful job. This is the guy. I'm definitely going to be calling in the future!

We have no regrets calling Anything Plumbing. They did a great job replacing our hot water heater for a reasonable price. We definitely recommend Anything Plumbing if you want a plumber you can trust. We would call again for any future plumbing needs.
They are very professional, knowledgeable and reliable. We highly recommend their business and would definitely use them again.
Very professional and answered all my questions. Quality work. Certainly would recommend.

Jarrett was great. He was able to help us the same day and gave me directions over the phone of what to do until he got to the house. He was quick and professional. We would definitely recommend Anything Plumping and use them again.
Jared is a smart guy who I respect for his professional services. I can always rely on him to shoot me straight.
Quick response, good price, professional, friendly team.  I recommend anything plumbing.

My hot water heater was running constantly. Called Jarrett at anything plumbing and he was over the next day. He found the leak and fixed the issue quickly and even fixed a thermostat issue with my hot water heater. I asked him for more work and he showed up when he said he would and did professional work and was courteous the whole time. Im not looking forward to more plumbing issues in the future but i would easily feel comfortable calling him for all my plumbing. A+
Replaced both washing machine fill faucets. Did a great job installing and cleaning after completion. Will definitely use again and highly recommend to anyone needing fast quality service.
Excellent work.
Our “go to” people for plumbing. Always responsive, on time and very knowledgeable. Reasonable costs.  Would highly recommend for anything plumbing!

Jarrett came to my home yesterday to fix a small plumbing problem.  I'd already had 2 different contractors try and fix it to no avail. Jarrett identified the problem immediately and replaced what was broken so now I have a functioning bathroom sink. He was polite and professional and also a clean worker. I will definitely use him again.

I called a number of plumbing companies within 20 miles of my location before I select it anything plumbing. It turned out to be a wise choice. I had same day service and the repairman was friendly, fast and efficient. The repair bill was well below what all of the other companies quoted. I highly recommend this company for your plumbing needs.

I had to get a water pressure regulator replaced at my residence. They were great . Very Professional and worked promptly to fix my problem. I would definitely recommend there service.  Fair pricing and great work.

This is an Incredible company to work with. If you have plumbing issues, call Anything Plumbing! They were extremely responsive, worked within my schedule and focused on providing high quality work. I can honestly say I have never experienced better customer service than Anything Plumbing. On top of that, they do top quality work. They have a customer for life!

I didn't hesitate to call Jarrett back for my second plumbing problem this month. Both times he was courteous, responsive, on-time, and professional. Prices are reasonable and he cleans up after the job. Hopefully, I won't need repairs again for a while but if I do, I will call on Anything Plumbing.

I have used Anything Plumbing three different times for various problems. Each time I have been extremely satisfied with their service and the work they completed. Jarrett is professional in all regards. Each time I have received quality work in a timely manner at a fair price. I will continue to use Anything Plumbing for all my plumbing needs and highly recommend them to others.

Jarrett is exceptional! Came over early to get the job done and done well. Installed a garbage disposal and fixed our drips in each bathroom. Personable, reliable, kind, and honest. I would highly recommend Anything Plumbing. Thank you Jarrett and wife (whom we didn't catch her name), you did a great job!!

I highly recommend this company. If you find yourself in need of plumbing services don't hesitate to use them. I'm the owner of a service company, and one of my employees accidently cut through a waterline at our customer's home. Jarrett arrived quickly (got there earlier than when he said he would). Jarrett was extremely professional. I can attest that he is highly skilled & a very knowledgeable plumber. He worked fast and did a great job cleaning up after the repair was made. Nothing short of an excellent job! I will most definitely use them again if I have plumbing needs.
A+. I appreciated their professionalism. They got right to work and got the job done quickly. Would call them again. Thanks again and have a good day!

My Garbage disposal started leaking and making quite a mess under the kitchen sink.  In the past, I read many favorable reviews about Jarrett and Anything Plumbing from a web-site called "My Neighborhood".  I decided to call Anything Plumbing and give them a try.  Jarrett arrived the next day exactly at the appointed time.  He had everything he needed to compete the task with him.  He explained to me why the original configuration of discharge piping (dishwasher as well as the garbage disposal) were not optimal and changed them to both look and function better.  He also installed a new garbage disposal.  All of this was completed in less than 1.5 hours and at an expense that was much less than I had anticipated (I've lived at this location over thirty years and had other plumbing issues).  Needless to say, I'm very impressed with Anything Plumbing and they are in my contacts folder.  Jarrett will be coming back in the near future to replace an old Shower valve for me.
Punctual, professional, and competent. I will use them again if I have plumbing needs.  Same day service in my case!

This duo of plumbers is bar none the best you'll find in the Huntsville area. I highly recommend you call up Jarrett for your plumbing needs. He came next day to replace a water heater, which led to a leaking hot water line fix and a hose bib replacement. He was thorough and accurate when cutting the drywall and replaced with patches that look very professional. He clearly explained what he was doing and showed me how he was going to do it. Please do yourself a favor and look no further than Anything Plumbing!

I am very pleased with the service.  When we were talking pricing before he started, he laid out several possibilities of problems with varying impact on cost.  He only repaired what he needed to and the cost was contained.  I know that if he wanted to be shady he could have been.  The opportunity was there, but I really am thankful that honest guys like Jaritt are out there.

On the technical side of details, my outdoor hose bib was leaking and has been since the house was purchased last year.  The home inspector identified high water psi, and also the leaking hose bib.  The inspectors said you should probably request a pressure regulator on your house, it is very high.  I decided not to request a pressure regulator but I did request the hose bib be fixed.  Long story short is, it was not fixed.

As it got closer to winter I started worrying about water freezing around the wet ground where it leaks and then messing up my foundation so I called Jaritt.

At the end of the service Jaritt tells me that he did not need to install a psi regulator because the psi was normal now and then explained that the city had fixed the issue in my neighborhood.  So there was opportunity there to jack the price.  But he was honest and I am appreciative.  Definitely recommend.

I called Wednesday afternoon about 3:00 and they came the next day on Thursday at 12:00 before they came they gave me a call to make sure that  I was expecting them they got right to the job and did it right very nice to have a prompt plumber.

Jarrett, was very professional, and provided services the very next day. He replaced two shower cartridges at a very affordable price! Anything Plumbing also provided a very reasonable estimate to remodel the bathroom/shower that adheres to Veterans Administration Standards for home improvement. Great job! Highly recommended.
I've been using Anything Plumbing for my plumbing needs for years now and they have always been good to me. They are honest, kind, and best of all they do great work!

We had a “water” leak, in the yard and after a couple of days of trying to decide if it was our neighbors or ours! We found it was ours, we then spent the next two days waiting on another plumbing company, that first called to come at 8 pm, to work in the yard. Too late to dig and see outside.They then didn’t show up by 5 the next day, when we called , couldn’t say when they were going to get to us.
So we moved on to Anything Plumbing, Jarrett and crew, showed up on time, diagnosed the problem, fixed it, and seemed fair in the price.  Not a big name brand, but I’d call him again before I’d call the others. Oct2019
Very professional, trustworthy, honest, and do very neat, professional job.
Completely professional, prices are the best I know of, on time (early, even), and will clearly explain all the issues before and during the work. HIGHLY recommend.

I had a main water pipe leak that Jarrett and team fixed after having three other plumbers come out and repair previously within two years of our newly built home. Jarrett located the problem and no issues since. I called him back to install new hammered bathroom sinks today and they did a Beautiful job!!! So Pleased with their work and prices. Very Reasonable and Knowledgeable!!! Thank you!!

Found out this afternoon that we had a water leak on our side of the meter.  Jarrett was on-site within a couple of hours, worked through the rain and had us fixed up same day.  Great work and great attitude!

Had major water leak out by my water meter. They got to me pretty quick, and did a excellent job on the repair. Job well done at a resonable fee. If you want a job done by a local plumber I highly recommend Anything Plumbing for the job.

I'd never met Jarrett but he was recommended to me.  I called in the morning and he offered to be at my house in the early afternoon. He diagnosed my problem--a broken pipe in my yard that was showing no obvious signs on the surface--dug 3.5' down,  and repaired the damage.  He was courteous, respectful, and made me feel I could trust him.  I'll use him again.  I recommend him without reservation.

I have used Anything Plumbing twice this month.  The quality of Jarrett's work is exceptional.  He arrives at the time stated and makes sure that everything is running perfectly before he leaves your home.
JUST purchased a home, he repaired my issue same day. VERY nice, VERY good work! And his prices beat others! I will use again!  Thank you!!!
Very fast and professional, very reasonable! Will use them from here on out.
Called Anything Plumbing about my tub faucet. Jarrett came out and took a look to see what my problem was. He fixed it in no time and was a reasonable price! Will call again!
I had a water line leaking and called them. They showed up the same day and had it fixed. Would definitely recommend.

I have used Anything Plumbing twice within the past year.  Once for a pressure relief valve by the City Meter and also a leaking shower mixing valve.  My mother has also used Anything Plumbing.  The service was quick and professional.   The fixes were repaired professionally and I have had no further problems since the time of repair.

I have used Anything Plumbing for 3 plumbing jobs over the last 7 years.  Each time I was very pleased with the quality of work performed by Jarrett.  Anything Plumbing's service was prompt and professional.  The expense for each job was also very reasonable.  Highly recommended!!
Great work! Friendly and professional.
Chris Cory was able to fix our washing machine very quickly. He is professional and we will definitely use him on any future appliance repairs we have.
I was very pleased with their service. They communicated very well, were on time and did a very good job. I would definitely use them again for appliance installation and repair.

Chris did a great job installing a new garbage disposal for us.  He was very prompt and professional.  We will be calling him again, as other needs arise.  He also did a great job for a friend recently, getting her refrigerator up and running promptly.  She recommended him to us, and we will recommend him, as well!

So polite so prompt so strong pulling my refrigerator out. Chris and Jason knew exactly what to do.
The whole job probably took 15 to 20 minutes. They let me know what their rate was which was awesome and that if they couldn’t fix it, they wouldn’t charge me. They also do other things besides APPLIANCES and love what they do if I could give them 10 stars I would. You’ll be happy with their services. Great guys.
Very professional and quick to respond. Will call him again next time we have an appliance issue and would recommend to others.
Chris is amazing! He is highly professional, hardworking, and reliable. With his prompt responses and efficient execution, he was able to fix my dryer in a day! Thank you, Chris!!!

Chris was knowledgeable, professional and very easy to do business with.  Mainly,  he fixed an insignia appliance for me that 2 others said they simply don't service.  Prices were fair.  I have hired him multiple times.
Fixed my refrigerator evap fan now I have ice cubes again!

Chris went over and beyond what I expected! He returned my phone call immediately, knew exactly what was wrong with my dryer, ordered the part and had my dryer working basically a day after my call. So professional, knowledgeable and polite! I will be using him again and highly recommend to anyone!
Chris Cory diagnosed and corrected the problem with my dishwasher very quickly.  He was very polite and cleaned up  behind himself. I would definitely recommend him for appliance services.

I am so impressed with this company.  Chris made me feel like a VIP from start to finish.  He ordered the most durable, effective part he needed to repair my very old (but usually very dependable) washing machine and then worked diligently to install it and make sure that my washer was working correctly, explaining every step along the way.
