When he received the part, he completed the job to our complete satisfaction! If you have garage door problems, then Jacob Jones is your Guy! Give him a call, you will not be disappointed!
Jacob at AK Overhead Doors got our new door ordered and installed within our budget. Easy to work with and he has a great knowledge of garage door types and installation techniques.
Great service and workmanship. The installer was very professional and completed the job on time. I would highly recommend these guys to anyone interested in having overhead doors installed.

I had Jacob install a garage door opener for my parents and they were extremely pleased and impressed with him and the job he did. My dealings with Jacob were via the telephone and he was responsive and knowledgeable . The price was fair and the job exceeded my expectations . They say “entrepreneurs mind their own business “ and he definitely does.

AK Overhead Door went above and beyond to make sure that we got exactly what we wanted instead of the same old cookie cutter doors that all of the neighbors had. They stayed in contact with us regularly to keep us informed of the status of the doors that we ordered and then came out promptly to install them as soon as they arrived. Extremely professional and courteous - I would highly recommend AK Overhead Door.

Got this number from a friend, set up a time to do the garage door, he came exactly when he said and fixed our problem. The garage door works better than new now. I will for sure us AK Overhead Door for any of our problems or routine maintenance.
Great service! Jacob is very professional and was able to get the job done quickly! Highly recommended!

Well when it comes to garage door I never really thought about it in till it broke. Never had to call anybody before so I called around like Lowe’s and Home Depot, Overhead Door and so on. Some company’s were very high on price or they would tell me next week they will get to me but with AK Overhead Door he was fair with pricing and very customer friendly which is what a lot of company’s don’t do anymore try to build the customer relationship and put them first. But AK Overhead Door came the next morning and fixed my headache. Very pleased and will continue to recommend this company. Great Job and very grateful for there service.

Jacob has done work for me on two occasions.  He installed a new door and a new opener.  His pricing was very fair and in both cases he was very efficient making sure the jobs were done right.  I highly recommend!
Great service would definitely recommend for your overhead door repairs
AK Overhead did an excellent job on my roll up door. Quick order and installation. Also beat out the local big name business on pricing. Top notch!

Very affordable. Owner does an amazing job, I could not even tell that we had a motor or garage door mounted when he was done removing ours. He also hauled it off for us. Overall great guy & I would definitely recommend him or use him again.

Jacob Jones really makes the job look easy. Had all the parts ordered and delivered and installed within a day. We also had a great choice of different high quality garage door systems to choose from.

I am pleased to commend the outstanding work on the construction of two separate decks at our homes.

Our homes are located in Moody and Pinson, Al. The craftsmanship of both decks is remarkable. The design perfectly complements the aesthetics of the home, and the quality of materials used is evident in their durability and finish. The attention to detail, from the precise measurements to the flawless installation, reflects a high level of professionalism and expertise. The decks has not only enhanced the functionality of the outdoor space but has also significantly increased the home's value.

Overall, the work on both decks has exceeded our expectations. The professionalism, skill, and dedication displayed in these projects are truly commendable. I highly recommend Wells Handyman & Home Repair for any construction needs.
Mr. Patrick replaced some boards on my deck and stained it. My deck looks so good. I appreciate him doing just in  time for my son's birthday party.
Showed up promptly and completed work as estimated, even with a couple of added items.  Very professional and cleaned up worksite and debris.

This is a great company to use for home remodeling and repairs.  They have done several jobs for friends and clients of mine (I am a realtor) and everyone has been very pleased with the work and cost!  I am looking forward to having them do some work for me in the near future!

We contracted j. Henry Construction through an Architect/Structural Engineer for a load bearing wall removal and staircase move. Jake quoted an acceptable price, worked with us on unknown issues, explained options in language we understood, brought in quality subcontractors and the results are beautiful. Would we use J. Henry again? Absolutely.

Construction of 3 car garage.
1. Accurate estimate
2. Fair prices
3. Shows up when promised
4. Gives text updates
5. Quick response to questions
6. Friendly and respectful crew
7. We requested recycling of the leaded glass window from old garage and they did an excellent installation.
7. When Menards damaged garage doors on delivery, Jake provided temporary barriers to get us through the winter.

We will definitely be using Jake for future projects - highly recommend!

Used J. Henry Construction for my deck project - they were awesome and very responsive.  Always on time and kept in contact during the entire process - will use them on my next project and have already recommended them to a couple of my neighbors.

We recently hired J. Henry Construction as the general contractor for a two story addition on our 1915 home and we could not have been more pleased.  The transition from the original house and the addition looks seamless, like it was always there.  Their attention to detail is impressive.  They worked with us to solve any issues that arose and offered suggestions for improvements.
They arrived promptly every day and were quick to return phone calls, great communication.  Their work is professional and top quality.  Jake and Ralph are a great team and genuinely nice guys, a pleasure to work with.  Would highly recommend!

We hired Jake and the crew to remodel our kitchen. We couldn't be happier with the results! The crew would arrive on-time every morning, they communicated very well, they were pleasant to be around, and cleaned up after themselves everyday. Jake and Ralph were a combination of skilled craftsmen and kinds humans. They stuck to the deadline and kept the project in budget.
I hired Jake a few years ago to do my bathroom.  His attention to detail was excellent.  He was a professional on time and very fair in his pricing. I would hire him again in a heartbeat.

We recently worked with Jake at J. Henry Construction and could not have been happier.  We contracted him to replace the 60+ year old kitchen and kicked around the idea for quite some time.  Price and quality were a big consideration because the amount of what we wanted to do was extensive.  We wanted to remove a load bearing wall and open up the kitchen to the rest of the house, move a closet, add a pocket door, replace electric and two windows, and install new cabinetry and flooring.
Because this was such a large project, we had quotes done from multiple contractors.  Having just done a living room project the year before it was important to me that the contractor did the majority of the work themselves. This was because the last project sat unworked and empty while we waited for subcontractors to come in and complete their sections.  Since a family of 5 relies so heavily on a kitchen I was looking for a contractor that could control the schedule and do it quickly.  Jake reassured me that all the work would be done by himself and would be complete in 4-5 weeks.  His price was considerably lower than our other quotes and he presented me with an itemized quote that addressed all the items I wanted included.  He started on time and finished on time as promised without issue.
We worked out all the details and stayed with relatives while Jake started because of the impact the demo would have to our home.  While we were out, he taped off a plastic screen that isolated the kitchen from the rest of the house.  Within three days everything was ripped out down to the 2x4’s and the load bearing wall was removed and the unilam support beam installed.  Our neighbor sent us pictures and I couldn’t believe how much work had been done.  You could see all the way up into the attic from our kitchen!
In the two weeks we were away, all the demo, structural work, electric was replaced, new insulation replaced, permit inspection completed and drywall went up.  Its important to note the level of communication Jake maintained during all this was high.  Our drawings showed six can lights and two pendant lights that looked fine on paper, but the 6th can light would have been too close to one of the pendants to look right.  When Jake realized this, he called me promptly, explained it to me and recommended we remove it from the plan.  I think a lot of contractors would have just installed everything per the drawing but Jake took the time to make sure it was going to look right and we were completely happy. It’s clear the Jake truly cares about the quality and appearance of his work.
There were so many little things that Jake and his partner did that impressed me along the way.  One of the items that impressed me was an issue with an exhaust vent we moved from the sidewall through the roof.  They patched up the hole and found some old paint in my garage and painted it over without prompting. That’s going above and beyond!
Another impressive measure was the dust control.  This was a huge renovation in the middle of our house.  As mentioned, Jake put up plastic to control it but a few times when they were sanding the drywall they grabbed our floor mop and whipped up the floor in a walkway area all without asking.  Things like this just made me feel like they cared for the work they were doing. We were not only happy with the work but able to function in our home despite the mess as it was all being worked on.
The work that Jake did was fantastic.  Everything is neat, clean and professional looking.  I really have no complaints at all.  As we are “moving in” I am looking things over to see if there are any punch list items to address.  I have no issues to add to a punch list and am so happy with this long-awaited project that I plan to use J. Henry exclusively on any remaining projects in my house.  Because of the level of communication, quality of work and speed of progress I highly recommend J. Henry Construction to anyone looking for a contractor.  This is undoubtedly a 5 out of 5 star review.
J. Henry Construction did an absolutely amazing job on my deck!! Jake was prompt and built quality deck at a reasonable price.

Jake from J.Henry Construction has done the best quality work for our house! He csne highly recommended and I'd seen his work in our neighborhood so thought I'd try the company out. He doesn't cut corners and is a bit of a perfectionist which in this case only benefits ME! 😄 I would recommend him to anyone looking for inside or outside work. While I had my kitchen and bathroom done by him,  my neighbors deck done by him looks amazing! Thanks Jake!

by-faith-masonry-and-home-repair.business name: By Faith Masonry and Home Repair

reviews.review_text: Great Service and extremely flexible with my schedule which is unmatched within the industry. They are awesome 100% would recommend.

I recently had the pleasure of working with By Faith Masonry and Home Repair, and I can't recommend them enough! From start to finish, Bridget demonstrated exceptional professionalism and skill. Her attention to detail in every aspect of the project was truly impressive.

Bridget's communication was top-notch; she kept me informed throughout the entire process, answering all my questions promptly and thoroughly. It was clear that she genuinely cares about her clients and their needs. The quality of her work exceeded my expectations, transforming my home beautifully.

If you're looking for a reliable and talented masonry and home repair service, look no further than By Faith Masonry and Home Repair. Thank you, Bridget, for your outstanding work! I will definitely be recommending you to friends and family!

I’m extremely pleased with Faith Masonry and Home Repair work completed for my rental property.  Bridgette was professional and responded to all my communications. I will definitely recommend her and will be using her for All my projects moving forward.
Bridget did amazing work and she was  reasonably priced. She had great communication.

Had some settling issues with my brick porch - they came
In with the best estimate and did an awesome job!  Impressed with their total clean up of the work area as well. Will use them again!  5 stars!!!
Please share your contact information I cannot find it...But would like to get an estimate of a smaller brick job.

I was well pleased with the work and fair price with Ronald. He repointed brick and replaced some. Also replaced a gutter downspout.
He cleaned up afterwards. He is very attractive to detail. I will not hesitate to use him again.
Ronald came out to repair our retaining wall and did a fantastic job quickly and with great skill. We appreciate his professionalism and quick response. Highly recommend.
Ronald did a fantastic job! I would recommend by faith masonry to anyone!

I highly recommend Ronald at Faith Masonry and Home Repair. He did a fantastic job repairing our badly damaged brick mailbox (part of which he had to completely rebuild) and made it look brand new! He also did a wonderful job cleaning and repairing many areas of our extensive 20 year old brick landscape wall. He is a very hard worker, cares about the quality of his work, and pays attention to every detail of his work. Ronald was so easy to communicate with and was always very respectful. His work is priced very fairly. I am certainly hiring him to do more work around our home.

Ronald did a great job!  He was prompt, courteous and very professional.  I would highly recommend Ronald to anyone needing quality masonry work.
I’m totally satisfied with the results and price.
I'm pleased with the work done. The gentleman was professional and efficient. Would definitely recommend.

Faith Masonry and Home Repair did an exceptional job in rebuilding the front entrance to our house.    The problem required a complete rebuild. I have attached two pictures to give an idea.   Very professional.  Worked to satisfy on every detail.    Outstanding cleanup at completion.    I will most certainly use Ronald Strauss and his team again
Very professional and excellent service. Provided good service with a short turn around time of completion from start date. Very conscientious. Prices fair. Very pleased!
Very pleased with work, highly recommended, very knowledgeable
Exceptional craftsmanship
Ronald did a fantastic job performing a brick mortar repair on my home. Ronald is quick to respond and extremely polite. I would recommend him for any brick work!
Came and got the job done
Ronald and his fiancé drove over 2 hours to repair a couple of bricks and mortar on my home today (Sunday). They were both very friendly and the work is exceptional.
I’m so glad I reached out to them , quick response and  always keep you updated , thank you so much for the wonderful job!

Ronald was great to work with and quickly assessed the work needed to complete some in-home repairs. I had an interior wall that needed repair and an adjoining garage wall that needed to be redone. Ronald was professional and respectful of my time and schedule. I liked that he was in the local area and had plenty of positive reviews. Other companies didn’t respond or simply missed commitments to follow up. Ronald was easy to communicate with and attentive to my needs. From the initial estimate through job completion, I felt like I was in good hands!
Professional in every way! Glad to work with this company, incredibly responsive and high quality work!

I needed a couple shutters repaired after a big wind. Ronald went the extra mile by ordering custom parts. He also took the time to clean it up after it was hung. Ronald definitely takes pride in a job done right. Thanks Ronald!!
Masonry repair far exceeded my expectations and the price was well worth it! Highly recommend!

Ronald did an excellent brick job.
He’s was very professional and got the job done quickly!
We are very pleased with his work. Highly recommend him for your next project.
Very polite and hard-working fellow. He suggested solutions and got things completed in a timely manner. Would call him again.
Only plumbing service I could get on Christmas Eve to fix a water leak, very responsive and professional. Asp reasonable price.
Mr. Strauss was absolutely amazing. He was professional,  flexible and honest about what I needed done. I will absolutely use him again!!!
Wall rock repair
Ron was very polite, professional, & cleaned up after himself.   He got three projects completed in a timely fashion and I felt very comfortable having him in my home.

Ceiling repair.  Very pleased with work and will definetly call back!  Repair really looked good! The details were spot on and was very impressed.  The misses will be happy to see this done.  Wish I could take credit!  Great job.
I would highly recommend Mr. Strauss for your next project.  He was spot on in repairing some brick work around my house. I will definitely use him for any further projects I have!!!
Repaired our front step bricks. Did a great job. Worked through the heat until the job was done. Thanks Ron.

I called up Ron to repair a couple cracks in my bay window on my bathroom and fix two missing bricks on my chimney foundation. He was
very professional and did a great job. He showed up when he told me he would be here and cleaned up the area. I would highly recommend him for any handy man work. He even asked if the quoted price was fair.  I went ahead and paid him an extra $40 for the great job he did. Thanks Ron.
Quick response and awesome brick work! Very affordable Will definitely hire again in the future .

I called Mr. Ron for a masonry  repair service.  He was at my home the next morning and completed the repair job.  He is professional, focused  and hardworking.  He also took the time to make adjustments to a problem left by another service provider who said it was the best that could be done.  I will definitely use By Faith Home Repair for other repair projects.

I had a horizontal crack in my external brick wall about 4.5 ft long. Found By Faith (Ron) on google maps with top ratings. He came by after about an hour of contacting on a Saturday afternoon. He gave a very good price and fixed it in about 2-3 hours, including time for a trip to the hardware store for supplies. The work he did was great and he cleaned all up not leaving a mess. Very good experience.

Faith Masonry did great work on an outdoor bar for us. Ron is extremely focused on detail and quality. He puts the customer first and does everything he can to make sure they are satisfied. I would highly recommend and will be using them again in the future.

We had two sets of brick steps leading to our patios that were crumbling. I called several business but Faith Masonry was the only one to return my call. Ronald was able to quickly give us a quote and scheduled time to do the work. Ronald took his time with the job and now the steps look fantastic! We are keeping Faith Masonry and Home Repair in mind for any other work we will need in the future. Highly recommend!

By Faith Masonry (BFM) built us a bench and fire-pit structures exactly as we planned. BFM was a delight to work with while assisting me with my design.  BFM was very meticulous and detailed with this project.  It was so refreshing to work with a company with such high standards and high quality work. BFM was very professional and displayed high quality workmanship. I would highly recommend ByFaith Masonry without any reservations. This company takes pride in their work and it certainly shows.

5 STARS! My garage door broke late one night & I called at 1030 planning to leave a voicemail. To my surprise Ronald answered the phone. I explain what happened & he showed up the next day to fix my garage! The weather end up getting really bad while he was at my house working so he came back the day after & got everything fixed within a few hours! He also hung up a large painting in my bedroom. I appreciate that he was able to work with me, even when the weather got bad. He’s sooo nice & prompt! Also extremely affordable! Don’t hesitate to book with By Faith Masonry & Home Repair!

What a wonderful person and so polite! I called Ronald today to ask about having my countertops and cabinets trimmed back so it would fit my stove. Two hours later he was here starting work. He did a fantastic job and my stove is finally back where it belongs instead of the middle of my kitchen floor. It's so hard finding someone who doesn't mind doing small jobs, so I cant thank him enough for coming by. His rate was very reasonable and since he does a wide variety of jobs I will definitely be calling him again.
Thank you Ronald for being a yes man! Hope to see you again soon!

Ronald was on time, professional, and did a great job taking out old grout and regrouting our shower and parts of our tile floor.  We found him to be hard working and dependable.  We are so pleased with the results!! We will definitely use him again when we have work to be done.

A good home repair contractor is always hard to find. Mr. Ron has done exceptional work in repairing a hole in the ceiling a plumber cut out to fix a pin hole leak and assisting me with two entry door repairs. One door was rotting out from the inside on the bottom and wasn't sealing well when shut. He fashioned a replacement out of a piece of 2x4 and had everything aligned perfectly. Installing the bottom sweep was now possible because of his work. The next door ended up having a more serious issue and requires the door, frame and all, to be removed from the wall. Door now shuts and seals perfectly and it looks like it was never removed from the wall in the first place.

I almost didn't want to write a review because part of me wants to monopolize his skills! Another thing is his communication. He always communicated with me on all repairs whether I was there in person or was away due to work. He sends photos of his progress as well which I really appreciated since I didn't get that with anyone else I've contracted work out with.

His pricing is very fair and I'd encourage anyone who works with him to sweeten the pot if you can when the good job is done. He's also one guy, so if you're able I encourage folks help him with heavy lifting. It'll make the job go by faster and he will appreciate the assistance which shows through is work and attention to detail. Once you find a good craftsman be good to them!

A+++ workmanship and professionalism. I will be using Ron and By Faith Masonry & Home Repair for all my home renovation and repair going forward.

How refreshing in today’s world to find someone who does what they say they will do and show up when they said they would. Well that was Ronald and ByFaith Masonry. Not only would I use him again I plan to give him all the work I can. Excellent workmanship. I am more than pleased. If you need any service that By Faith does use them. You won’t be sorry. I don’t usually do reviews but I felt the need to tell anyone who will listen about Ronald and By Faith .

Ron put airstone around my fireplace he did a great job,reasonable price and was professional,courteous and respectful I definitely will use him again if needed repairs  will send picture of his work in a couple of days
Excellent job of roof and drywall repair. Knowledgeable, conscientious , and respectful with reasonable pricing.  I will definitely be using this contractor again.

Ronald took on my large commercial project which the masons had walked off of and he completed the tasks in the time that I needed to prevent the schedule from getting blown. The masonry work was very detailed and not only did he do a great job on the portion that he completed, he also did some rework of the other masons work and made their work look great. I would recommend Ronald for any job, big or small, commercial or residential. He’s a great guy to work with and in the short time that I got to know him he will always be a good friend. Thanks so very much buddy for everything and I hope to work with you again some day.

Ronald did a fine job with something I needed last minute. He was very friendly, polite, and a perfect gentleman. When there was a small issue after he had left, Ronald promptly came back and fixed it. I recommend his services.
Great professional work done at a reasonable price on replacing shingles on a section of our roof! Will use again on future jobs! Highly recommend!
Mr. Strauss installed a wheelchair ramp for me. He was friendly, efficient, knowledgeable, and did an excellent job. I would highly recommend him.
This man works hard for his five star reviews. Costumer/ Project appreciation, dedication and satisfaction goes a long way.
Ronald fixed 2 interior door and hung a new one for us. He was very professional and did a great job.

Ronald did a great job on repairing our brick steps that were in bad shape. He was very professional and pleasant to work with. And the cost was very reasonable. We would highly recommend him for any job.
Randal build us a mailbox with matching column on the other side of our driveway. He did an awesome job.
Ronald installed a stamped concrete patio for me and did a great job. We will contact Ronald for future projects.

Great experience. Ronald conveniently quoted quickly via text message pictures and a few follow up questions. He came in under budget (got started the next day). He repaired a spot on my roof and damaged soffit. Looks good as new.

Other big companies’ quotes were much higher and they didn’t seem to care about my business or me as a person. Ronald communicated well and always gave me a heads up on when he was arriving as well as letting me know all of the details of the project. He went above and beyond - rolled my trash can in for me (1/4 mile long driveway), cleaned up after, and even did a safety repair on my deck for free that he spotted while doing a roofing job.

Couldn’t be more satisfied and will be using him for future repairs/projects!

Ronald repaired our garage door. It broke and was crooked. It was a 2 man job to fix but he managed to do it by himself. The cost of labor was very reasonable. He did a great job. I would highly recommend him for jobs around your house! We will be calling him again for house projects and repairs!

Ronald is a true professional always willing to solve any issues that came up while repairing and replacing our floor. He has great customers service and was always receptive to additional work or requested changes.  He is dedicated to the highest level of performance.  I highly recommend Ronald for any project.
Ronald did a flat stacked stone mailbox for us. He helped us understand what the options were and it was exactly what we’d hoped—it looks amazing!

Ronald did a great job on several projects around the house. He built a fence around our pool imbedded into concrete blocks. He also built a wall inside our house. His craftsmanship was impeccable. We were extremely happy with his quality of work. He made sure that we were happy with everything before he considered the job complete. I will be using him for future projects and, I highly recommend him to anyone looking for someone to complete projects around the house looking for high quality work.

We have used Ronald for some plumbing work and to install our over the stove microwave. We have no complaints. Ronald is very professional and has the experience to get the work done! I Recommend Ronnie to take care of your next service.
Did a fantastic job on cutting a new crawl space opening.

Highly recommend!  Marty was punctual and took care of all the plumbing jobs around the house. He was here for a leak, but completed three other jobs while here. Great customer service and communication!
Marty was on time and reliable. He explained everything he was doing and answered all my questions. Great customer service

You don’t realize how much you need hot water until you don’t have it. S&S was quick to respond and worked me into their schedule the same day. Thanks S&S! I would absolutely use again and would recommend.
Marty was extremely prompt and very helpful as well as knowledgeable! Will call again if needed

I was very pleased on how swiftly they responded to my plumbing emergency. The technician was very  knowledgeable in his area of expertise  and had my issue resolved in a very timely manner.  Thank you S&S PLUMBING!!

My experience with Marty at S&S Plumbing was excellent. He made the extra effort to take care of the water heater leak. Marty also took the time to explain and offer solutions to another issue. He is one of those people who makes the effort to satisfy his customer. I very highly recommend Marty and S&S Plumbing.

My experience with Marty at S&S Plumbing was excellent. He made the extra effort to replace our broken water heater in an expedited way. He worked with the home warranty people to get their approval to replace our heater on the same day as his first visit. On the installation visit he overcame unforseen problems to get our heater in and working so we could avoid another cold shower. Marty is one of those people who goes to any extra effort to satisfy his customer. I very highly recommend Marty and S&S Plumbling.

I am so pleased with the work done l give S&S Plumbing Service a 5 star. Great work and great person. Sorry l hit the stars before l read it. 5 stars is what he deserves.
.
Very pleased!!!

I recently had the pleasure of engaging S&S Plumbing Service for some repairs in my home, and I must say the experience exceeded my expectations.  Marty, the owner,  personally handled the task of replacing my sink faucet and repairing my garbage disposal.

Not only did Marty complete the repairs efficiently,  but he also went above and beyond to ensure everything was in perfect perfect working order before he left. The quality of his workmanship speaks volumes about his dedication to excellence, but what really set him apart was his patience and willingness to to address all my inquiries.

In summary,  I can't recommend S&S Plumbing Service highly enough. Marty's professionalism, friendliness,  and attention to detail make him standout in the industry. If you're in need of plumbing services, look no further. You won't be disappointed! Thanks Marty!
Great job for a great price, and Marty has great taste in music, too! Will definitely call S&S again in the future.
Great work as always! S&S and Marty are the best!
Marty was very accommodating and was willing to communicate on the weekend! The SAME DAY I submitted my service request he reached out to me to schedule my appointment. Highly recommended!
Highly recommend! Marty came out super quick and fixed multiple issues in my house in record time. I couldn’t be happier with my experience.
Nice, did the job quickly and well.  Will definitely use Marty in the future.  Great guy!
Awesome job! Hats off to Marty Strickland for great and timely work, Big Thanks 👍🏽
Best plumbing service!  Super nice and polite and always does A plus work!!
Very easy to work with, reliable and quality work.

My service was arranged through my home warranty company, and I was very pleased! Marty let me know when he was on his way and exactly what time I could expect him. I had a leaky valve on my water heater, and he had it replaced within minutes. I would not hesitate to highly recommend him for any of your plumbing needs.

S&S was sent through our home warranty for a service call on our kitchen sink drain that was leaking. Marty arrived promptly and replaced the old fittings in no time. Kind and professional. Would recommend for future plumbing issues.
I have used S and S a couple of times through our home warranty. The most recent time, I needed a new water heater. Marty came and replaced my water heater quickly, cleanly, and professionally.

Marty was flexible and easy to communicate with on scheduling our repair through our home warranty service. He did a great job with replacing our old, heavy, broken pipe, and he cleaned up afterwards. Would not hesitate to use his services in the future!

Marty was very helpful. He answered all my questions and checked anything I was concerned about. Gave me tips to keep my water heater running well and what to look out for. Very friendly and professional guy, would recommend.

Marty was excellent. He did a great job fixing our hot water heater. He also took the time to show me how to drain and properly maintain the hot water heater. He was fun to chat with while he worked and was very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend him to anyone.
Marty was very friendly and worked me in on his schedule ahead of time. He figured out our problem quickly and had the shower fixed within 20 minutes.  Highly recommend!
First time having Marty with S&S out here for us and he didn’t disappoint. Very polite and is an expert in his field. We’ll definitely be reaching out to him in the future!
Marty came out and fixed a hole in my drywall that a precious company failed to finish. Came when he said he would and was on time. Good guy, and a professional! Will use him in the future!
S&S Plumbing did an excellent job with installing my new hot water heater. The communication and responsiveness was out of this world. Everyone needs a Marty at S&S for their plumbing services.

Marty was so professional, yet friendly. Kept  me updated on service times/arrivals. Was able to diagnose and make the repair on the same visit. I will definitely use his company again for plumbing repairs.
Marty was a joy to work with! Great communication skills and was able to fit us in with our not so flexible work schedule. Will use him again and highly recommend!
My service provider made sure i was fully informed. He was polite, friendly, and professional.
Very friendly to work with,  explained everything well,  and got the job done in a timely manner. I appreciate Marty handling this and taking care of my water leak issue.

Marty is awesome! I had an issue with a leak from the garage.  I  was very concerned because I could see the water through the bricks and was afraid my water bill was going to sky rocket.  Marty was contacted that evening and worked me in to his very busy schedule the next day.  He showed us what created the leak, repaired the leak, and was so courteous and professional.  I truly appreciate his understanding of my situation and the worry it caused.  He not only fixed the leak, but relieved my anxiety.   I highly recommend S&S plumbing and will trust them with any future plumbing needs.
Great work, Marty.  Appreciate your Professionalism and skill.

Marty Strickland did a phenomenal job. Above and beyond even took time to teach me exactly what he was doing while he did it! Very thankful for a good experience and recommend him highly. Also doesn’t hurt that he’s a funny guy as well!

This company was fantastic. We had a different company come out and did a very poor job on our toilet. These guys came out and did a very thorough job the right way and completely fixed our toilet. Showed us what went wrong and fixed it. It works better now than when we first moved in. Couldn’t recommend them more.

Nicholas and Chris did a great job fixing a leak in the main water line outside of my home. They were able to fit me into the schedule several days sooner than anyone else I talked with, and they were helpful to inform me of known and unknown potential expenses. When the details of a home warranty company came into play, they gave me some input and time to sort out the specifics in order to minimize the cost I had to bear. Nicholas even gave me some great guidance without hesitation on a few smaller plumbing projects I hoped to undertake by myself in the future. When dealing with something as important as water lines, I would much rather hire someone who does quality work than someone who just "gets it done" for cheap. Nevertheless, I felt like their service was a solid value and would absolutely call them again. The peace of mind of knowing a licensed pro completed the job and will stand by their work is worth a LOT. I would absolutely recommend S&S and Nicholas especially.

Marty was great, he fixed a valve issue, checked my other valves to make sure they were ok, changed out several faucets. He was quick and efficient. Will definitely call him again and cannot recommend him highly enough

Nicholas and his team are intelligent and generous professionals who clearly know their trade. During a leak detection service call, they went so far as to re-caulk certain tub fixtures while outright replacing a rusty old pipe that sent orange water into the bath when turned on. These additional touches weren't part of the service, but Nicholas quickly offered (without our asking) to replace and seal these fixtures as merely part of his visit. After trying other, bigger-name plumbing companies in the area, S&S was clearly the winner. Do yourself a favor and hire these plumbers if you want the job done thoroughly, correctly, and without a price tag that'll make you faint.
Such wonderful and timely service!  Professional, quick, things work now!  Thank you!!!!!

They answered the first time I called, and made time to come to my house and fix my water heater the next day (during the week of Christmas). My water heater is working better than when I first got it. Definitely will use them for all of my plumbing needs!
S&S Plumbing was great fixing my kitchen sink. They came quick and we’re very professional.

Marty has done work for us multiple times, and all of his work has been above and beyond just the bare minimum. Hes very professional and up front about any costs etc., as well as friendly and easy to work with. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone that needs top quality work
Very professional and did excellent work

We had a leaky shower head that needed to be rebuilt. The service was professional, timely, and very reasonable. After getting a rate that was entirely to high by a different company, we turned to S & S. They will be our sole provider to fix any plumbing issues that may come up in the future. It is a relief to find a high quality, reasonable, honest plumbing service in the Birmingham Area.

Thanks Marty / Nicholas!
I can’t say enough good things about Nicholas Lyons! He was professional, personable, intelligent and completed our job in a timely and efficient manner! I’ll be calling him again in the future!

Nick was the person that handled our service, and he was awesome. Throughout the process he communicated well and explained what he was doing as he was doing it. I highly recommend using this company for your plumbing needs.

Nick showed up on time to install our recirculating pump. He explained what he was going to do and was very professional.  We now have hot water in seconds instead of waiting 5 minutes. My wife is elated. We are not wasting gallons of water waiting on it to get hot now.

I have used S&S Plumbing several times. They have always been very professional, prompt, and cost effective. Their work was has always been done right. Nick is great at his job. Very knowledgeable and professional. I will continue to use S&S for all my plumbing needs because I trust them.
They are always timely, professional, and provide a quality service. 5 Stars!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Our water heater went out flooding our downstairs.  S&S Plumbing responded quickly and repaired the problem.  They replaced the water heater and pressure regulator correcting the problem.  The price was reasonable.  S&S worked with our home warranty to cover part of the repairs.

We had a handful of minor issues in the older home we just bought (no hot water in shower, slow draining shower, toilet that wouldn't stop running).  Marty came out on time and quickly and efficiently fixed all our pesky problems.  He even went above and beyond and tightened up a loose shower door and double checked the hot water temperature setting to make sure the kids shower wouldn't get too hot . Not only will I call S&S Plumbing for future issues but I'll also recommend them without reservation to friends.

This company is awesome! Shout out to Nicholas, the amazing plumber, for being so knowledgeable, punctual, tidy, and respectful of our home.

The office staff is also kind and professional.

We would recommend this company to anyone and everyone!
Nicholas showed up on time and went over and above! He took the time to explain the issues to us and got right to work! Highly recommend them for any plumbing needs!

Given the issue may be a full blown water replacement, Nicholas replaced the drain valve which was part of my dripping leak issue but sadly it still has a slight drip coming from somewhere else (that is not an easy patch). Eventually it will need a full replacement but given the renovation crew that redid this house for a broker did such a terrible job with gas lines surrounding the water heater, it was going to be a costly out of pocket replacement due to access issues. We’re holding off until it’s a must and will get things taken care of through our home warranty group. So, I do recommend S&S but I just hope you’re situation is easier to review than mine.
Thank you S & S Plumbing  for coming to my rescue. In a time of an emergency, you delivered.  A very nice, friendly, professional  staff. Nicholas  did a very good job. Thank you Nicholas.

Nicholas was very helpful! He was called to my home to repair a plumbing/water heater issue, but it turned out that the HVAC condensation pipe was clogged. He could have had me call the warranty company back and get an HVAC consult. Instead, he unclogged the pipe & within minutes the problem was solved. Very pleased!

S&S Plumbing has saved us on two different occasions. We have used them at a rental property to find a specialty sized water heater to fit in a tiny closet with an indoor air handler (which would have taken days if we used someone else) and install it in the tight space. We needed them quickly to keep the renter happy and they went above and beyond for us. We also had them install and run a water line to a new refrigerator at our own home. Both times they showed up on time, were professional and finished the job to our liking. I would suggest them to my friends and family and we will use them in the future.

Nicholas was professional, personable, and prompt with repairs. He also was patient while explaining the repairs he was doing and was more than willing to share his knowledge. Will absolutely be using S&S services again.

Recently had a water pressure issue at my residence.  These guys were outstanding.  Stayed in touch the entire time letting me know exactly when they'd arrive and were there promptly.  Answered all my questions professionally and took care of the issue fast.
Great company and I'll definitely use again if the opportunity arises

A++++++ service! We had a new water heater installed under another company that was under our home warranty. Not only did they not install it correctly they  put us in danger by not installing proper heating and water regulators with it. We were put in touch with S&S to fix our issue and they not only fixed it but was very very professional and talked with us through every step and why these things were important. I won’t call anyone else to do the job!
Thank you again for your top notch service!

S&S fixed a major problem for us after another plumber that was dispatched by our home warranty company improperly installed a new hot water heater.   They provide top notch service on time and they know what they are doing.   Pros in every sense of the word.   Highly recommend!    Call S&S
Marty and his crew were great to work with.  Outside pipes needed replacing and S&S came and did the job promptly and for a far better price that those "big name" guys. Very happy with the service.

Nicholas showed up right on time to the appointment.  Walked us through everything that was need, and even educated us on a few different issues that we need to be aware of with our faucet that was installed.  He was quick, curtious and followed through.  No issues, and kept us up to date when he was going to be headed our way.  Could not have been happier.  Even got us in a day early, which was a welcomed surprise!

I had a plumber to come out and charge us for “fixing” a leak that turns out was not even where the leak was coming from. When the leak continued, we contacted S&S and they actually took the time to find where the leak was coming from.. They also took the time to work around my schedule to find a convenient time to be there. I would highly recommend them for any plumbing needs!!
Service was second to none! Top notch! Great people, customer service and did the job perfectly. Highly recommend!
Came an hour away through snow to repair my water heater. I appreciate them . A couple of good guys

The owner, Marty, gave the most responsive, professional, and friendly service I’ve experienced. He was able to fix all of my issues at my new home and at an affordable price! I have used S&S several times and they’re the only plumbing service in Birmingham that I trust! 10/10
Nicholas came out, he was very knowledgable and professional. He helped with all my plumbing needs. Would definitely recommend.
Nicolas was fantastic.  He was very honest and upfront about everything he was doing.  Very professional and did a great job.  I would highly recommend him!
Nicolas is very professional,  knowledgeable and compassionate. He is an excellent communicator.

Prompt and courteous service.  Worked with my schedule.  Had to make a second trip to my house and he made everything right.  They were sent out by my home warranty service, but I would definitely use them even without the warranty service.

Nicholas was awesome!  He is extremely knowledgeable and his work was superb.  He was an excellent communicator and very professional.  I would highly recommend S and S to anyone looking for a plumber in the Birmingham area.
Fantastic experience. Nicholas was very prompt and professional. He was able to fix for $75 a problem another company tired to charge me $900 for. Job well done.
Our water heater broke over a weekend and Nicholas fit us into his busy schedule on the same day to fix it! Greatly appreciate his professionalism and thoroughness in getting the job done!
Amazing service and great company to do business with! They show up on time, clean cut, explains everything and are very patient.

Great Service by a Great Tech! Nicholas Lyons was very professional, answered all questions I had, and let me watch over his shoulder the whole time he worked. You can tell he cares about doing right by his customers.
I want to brag on Nicolas Lyons. He came out to my house on 03/18/2019 to fix my water heater. He was very professional, helpful and most of all nice. So, major kudos to Mr. Lyons. Have a great day.

myles-electrical-plumbing-and-minor-repa.business name: Myles Electrical & Plumbing and Minor Repairs

reviews.review_text: He gave me a price and did the work, I am very pleased

Wow. Great person to work with, and very professional. My lighting in my bathroom is better than ever. More than reasonable prices. Myles: For a Smile..... I'll go an Extra Mile!      Would highly recommend.
